content_old: 4 And the strength of the king loves justice. You have established equity; you have executed justice and righteousness in Jacob.

content: 5 Exalt Yahweh our God, and worship at his footstool. He is holy.
content_old: 5 Exalt Yahweh our God, and worship at his footstool. He is holy.

content: 6 Moses and Aaron were among his priests; Samuel also was among those who called on his name. They called to Yahweh, and he answered them.
content_old: 6 Moses and Aaron were among his priests; Samuel also was among those who called on his name. They called to Yahweh, and he answered them.

content: 7 He spoke to them in the pillar of cloud. They kept his testimonies and the statute he gave to them.
content_old: 7 He spoke to them in the pillar of cloud. They kept his testimonies and the statute he gave to them.

content: 8 O Yahweh our God, you answered them. You were a forgiving God to them, but an avenger of their wrong deeds.
content_old: 8 O Yahweh our God, you answered them. You were a forgiving God to them, but an avenger of their wrong deeds.

content: A psalm of thanksgiving.
content_old: A psalm of thanksgiving.

content: 1 Shout in triumph to Yahweh, all the earth.
content_old: 1 Shout in triumph to Yahweh, all the earth.

content: 2 Serve Yahweh with joy; come into his presence with exultation.
content_old: 2 Serve Yahweh with joy; come into his presence with exultation.

content: 3 Know that Yahweh, he is God; he made us and we are his. We are his people and the sheep of his pasture.
content_old: 3 Know that Yahweh, he is God; he made us and we are his. We are his people and the sheep of his pasture.

content: 4 Enter his gates with thanksgiving, his courts with praise. Give thanks to him; bless his name.
content_old: 4 Enter his gates with thanksgiving, his courts with praise. Give thanks to him; bless his name.

content: Of David. A psalm.
content_old: Of David. A psalm.

content: 1 I will sing of loyal love and justice; I will sing praises to you, O Yahweh.
content_old: 1 I will sing of loyal love and justice; I will sing praises to you, O Yahweh.

content: 2 I will give attention to the way of integrity. When will you come to me? I will walk in the integrity of my heart in the midst of my house.
content_old: 2 I will give attention to the way of integrity. When will you come to me? I will walk in the integrity of my heart in the midst of my house.

content: 3 I will not set before my eyes any wicked thing. I hate the work of those who fall away; it will not cling to me.
content_old: 3 I will not set before my eyes any wicked thing. I hate the work of those who fall away; it will not cling to me.

content: 4 A perverse heart will depart from me; I will not know evil.
content_old: 4 A perverse heart will depart from me; I will not know evil.

content: 5 One who slanders his neighbor in secret, him I will destroy. One haughty of eyes and arrogant of heart, him I will not endure.
content_old: 5 One who slanders his neighbor in secret, him I will destroy. One haughty of eyes and arrogant of heart, him I will not endure.

content: 6 My eyes will be on the faithful of the land, that they may live with me. He who walks in the way of integrity, he shall minister to me.
content_old: 6 My eyes will be on the faithful of the land, that they may live with me. He who walks in the way of integrity, he shall minister to me.

content: 7 There will not live in the midst of my house a worker of deceit. One who speaks lies will not remain before my eyes.
content_old: 7 There will not live in the midst of my house a worker of deceit. One who speaks lies will not remain before my eyes.

content: A prayer of one afflicted, when he grows faint and pours out his lament before Yahweh.
content_old: A prayer of one afflicted, when he grows faint and pours out his lament before Yahweh.

content: 1 O Yahweh, hear my prayer, and let my cry for help come to you.
content_old: 1 O Yahweh, hear my prayer, and let my cry for help come to you.

content: 2 Do not hide your face from me in the day of my trouble. Incline your ear to me. In the day I call, answer me quickly,
content_old: 2 Do not hide your face from me in the day of my trouble. Incline your ear to me. In the day I call, answer me quickly,

content: 3 for my days vanish in smoke, and my bones are charred like a hearth.
content_old: 3 for my days vanish in smoke, and my bones are charred like a hearth.

content: 4 My heart is struck like grass and withers. Indeed, I forget to eat my bread.
content_old: 4 My heart is struck like grass and withers. Indeed, I forget to eat my bread.

content: 5 Because of the sound of my groaning my bones cling to my skin.
content_old: 5 Because of the sound of my groaning my bones cling to my skin.

content: 6 I am like an owl of the wilderness; I am like a little owl of the ruins.
content_old: 6 I am like an owl of the wilderness; I am like a little owl of the ruins.

content: 7 I lie awake and I am like a lone bird on a roof.
content_old: 7 I lie awake and I am like a lone bird on a roof.

content: 8 All the day my enemies reproach me; those who mock me swear oaths against me.
content_old: 8 All the day my enemies reproach me; those who mock me swear oaths against me.

content: 9 Indeed, I eat ashes like bread and mix my drink with tears
content_old: 9 Indeed, I eat ashes like bread and mix my drink with tears

content: 10 because of your indignation and anger, for you have picked me up and thrown me away.
content_old: 10 because of your indignation and anger, for you have picked me up and thrown me away.

content: 11 My days are like a lengthened shadow, and I wither like grass.
content_old: 11 My days are like a lengthened shadow, and I wither like grass.

content: 12 But you, O Yahweh, abide forever, and your remembrance from generation to generation.
content_old: 12 But you, O Yahweh, abide forever, and your remembrance from generation to generation.

content: 13 You rise up and take pity on Zion, because it is time to favor it, for the appointed time has come.
content_old: 13 You rise up and take pity on Zion, because it is time to favor it, for the appointed time has come.

content: 14 Your servants take pleasure in her stones, and show favor to its dust.
content_old: 14 Your servants take pleasure in her stones, and show favor to its dust.

content: 15 Then the nations will fear the name of Yahweh, and all the kings of the earth your glory.
content_old: 15 Then the nations will fear the name of Yahweh, and all the kings of the earth your glory.

content: 16 For Yahweh will rebuild Zion; he will appear in his glory.
content_old: 16 For Yahweh will rebuild Zion; he will appear in his glory.

content: 17 He will turn his attention to the prayer of the destitute and will not despise their prayer.
content_old: 17 He will turn his attention to the prayer of the destitute and will not despise their prayer.

content: 18 Let this be written for the next generation, so that a people yet to be created may praise Yah,
content_old: 18 Let this be written for the next generation, so that a people yet to be created may praise Yah,

content: 19 that he looked down from his holy height. Yahweh looked from heaven over the earth
content_old: 19 that he looked down from his holy height. Yahweh looked from heaven over the earth

content: 20 to hear the groaning of the prisoner, to liberate those destined to die,
content_old: 20 to hear the groaning of the prisoner, to liberate those destined to die,

content: 21 so that they may make known in Zion the name of Yahweh, and his praise in Jerusalem,
content_old: 21 so that they may make known in Zion the name of Yahweh, and his praise in Jerusalem,

content: 22 when the peoples assemble, together with kingdoms, to serve Yahweh.
content_old: 22 when the peoples assemble, together with kingdoms, to serve Yahweh.

content: 23 He has broken my strength along the way; he has cut short my days.
content_old: 23 He has broken my strength along the way; he has cut short my days.

content: 24 I say, “My God, do not carry me off from my life in the middle of my days.” Your years continue throughout all generations.
content_old: 24 I say, “My God, do not carry me off from my life in the middle of my days.” Your years continue throughout all generations.

content: 25 Long ago you laid the foundation of the earth, and the heavens are the work of your hands.
content_old: 25 Long ago you laid the foundation of the earth, and the heavens are the work of your hands.

content: 26 They will perish, but you will endure. And like a garment they will all wear out, you will replace them like clothing, and they will be set aside.
content_old: 26 They will perish, but you will endure. And like a garment they will all wear out, you will replace them like clothing, and they will be set aside.

content: 27 But you are the same, and your years do not end.
content_old: 27 But you are the same, and your years do not end.

content: Of David.
content_old: Of David.

content: 1 Bless Yahweh, O my soul, and all within me, bless his holy name.
content_old: 1 Bless Yahweh, O my soul, and all within me, bless his holy name.

content: 2 Bless Yahweh, O my soul, and do not forget all his benefits:
content_old: 2 Bless Yahweh, O my soul, and do not forget all his benefits:

content: 3 who forgives all your iniquity, who heals all your diseases,
content_old: 3 who forgives all your iniquity, who heals all your diseases,

content: 4 who redeems your life from the pit, who crowns you with loyal love and mercies,
content_old: 4 who redeems your life from the pit, who crowns you with loyal love and mercies,

content: 5 who satisfies your life with good so that your youth is renewed like the eagle’s.
content_old: 5 who satisfies your life with good so that your youth is renewed like the eagle’s.

content: 6 Yahweh does deeds of justice and judgments for all who are oppressed,
content_old: 6 Yahweh does deeds of justice and judgments for all who are oppressed,

content: 7 who made known his ways to Moses, his deeds to the people of Israel.
content_old: 7 who made known his ways to Moses, his deeds to the people of Israel.

content: 8 Yahweh is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger and abundant in loyal love.
content_old: 8 Yahweh is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger and abundant in loyal love.

content: 9 He does not dispute continually, nor keep his anger forever.
content_old: 9 He does not dispute continually, nor keep his anger forever.

content: 10 He has not dealt with us according to our sins, nor repaid us according to our iniquities.
content_old: 10 He has not dealt with us according to our sins, nor repaid us according to our iniquities.

content: 11 For as the heavens are high above the earth, so his loyal love prevails over those who fear him.
content_old: 11 For as the heavens are high above the earth, so his loyal love prevails over those who fear him.

content: 12 As far as east is from west, so he has removed far from us the guilt of our transgressions.
content_old: 12 As far as east is from west, so he has removed far from us the guilt of our transgressions.

content: 1 Praise Yah. Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loyal love is forever.

content: 29 He made the storm be still and their waves became calm.
content_old: 29 He made the storm be still and their waves became calm.

content: 30 Then they were glad because they grew silent, so he guided them to their desired harbor.
content_old: 30 Then they were glad because they grew silent, so he guided them to their desired harbor.

content: 31 Let them give thanks to Yahweh for his loyal love and his wonderful deeds for the children of humankind,
content_old: 31 Let them give thanks to Yahweh for his loyal love and his wonderful deeds for the children of humankind,

content: 32 and let them exalt him in the congregation of the people, and praise him in the assembly of the elders.
content_old: 32 and let them exalt him in the congregation of the people, and praise him in the assembly of the elders.

content: 33 He turns rivers into a wilderness and springs of water into thirsty ground,
content_old: 33 He turns rivers into a wilderness and springs of water into thirsty ground,

content: 34 a fruitful land into a salty place, because of the evil of its inhabitants.
content_old: 34 a fruitful land into a salty place, because of the evil of its inhabitants.

content: 35 He turns a wilderness into a pool of water and a dry land into springs of water.
content_old: 35 He turns a wilderness into a pool of water and a dry land into springs of water.

content: 36 And he settles the hungry there, so that they may establish a city to inhabit,
content_old: 36 And he settles the hungry there, so that they may establish a city to inhabit,

content: 37 and sow fields and plant vineyards, that they may yield fruit at harvest.
content_old: 37 and sow fields and plant vineyards, that they may yield fruit at harvest.

content: 38 And he blesses them and they multiply greatly, and he does not let their cattle become few.
content_old: 38 And he blesses them and they multiply greatly, and he does not let their cattle become few.

content: 39 When they become few and they are bent down from the oppression of calamity and grief,
content_old: 39 When they become few and they are bent down from the oppression of calamity and grief,

content: 40 he pours contempt on princes and causes them to wander in a trackless waste.
content_old: 40 he pours contempt on princes and causes them to wander in a trackless waste.

content: 41 But he protects the needy from misery, and he makes their families like a flock.
content_old: 41 But he protects the needy from misery, and he makes their families like a flock.

content: 42 The upright see it and are glad, and all wickedness shuts its mouth.
content_old: 42 The upright see it and are glad, and all wickedness shuts its mouth.

content: A song. A psalm of David.
content_old: A song. A psalm of David.

content: 1 My heart is steadfast, O God. I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.
content_old: 1 My heart is steadfast, O God. I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.

content: 2 Awake, harp and lyre. I will awake the dawn.
content_old: 2 Awake, harp and lyre. I will awake the dawn.

content: 3 I will give you thanks among the peoples, O Yahweh; I will give you praise among the nations,
content_old: 3 I will give you thanks among the peoples, O Yahweh; I will give you praise among the nations,

content: 4 because your loyal love is great above the heavens, and your faithfulness reaches to the clouds.
content_old: 4 because your loyal love is great above the heavens, and your faithfulness reaches to the clouds.

content: 5 Be exalted above the heavens, O God, and let your glory be above all the earth,
content_old: 5 Be exalted above the heavens, O God, and let your glory be above all the earth,

content: 6 so that your beloved ones may be rescued. Save by your right hand and answer me.
content_old: 6 so that your beloved ones may be rescued. Save by your right hand and answer me.

content: 7 God has spoken in his holiness, “I will exult, I will divide up Shechem, and portion out the valley of Succoth.
content_old: 7 God has spoken in his holiness, “I will exult, I will divide up Shechem, and portion out the valley of Succoth.

content: 8 Gilead is mine. Manasseh is mine. And Ephraim is the helmet for my head. Judah is my scepter;
content_old: 8 Gilead is mine. Manasseh is mine. And Ephraim is the helmet for my head. Judah is my scepter;

content: 9 Moab is my washing pot. Over Edom I will cast my sandal; Over Philistia I will shout in triumph.”
content_old: 9 Moab is my washing pot. Over Edom I will cast my sandal; Over Philistia I will shout in triumph.”

content: 10 Who will bring me to the fortified city? Who will lead me to Edom?
content_old: 10 Who will bring me to the fortified city? Who will lead me to Edom?

content: 11 Have you not rejected us, O God, and not gone out with our armies, O God?
content_old: 11 Have you not rejected us, O God, and not gone out with our armies, O God?

content: 12 Give us help against the enemy, for the help of humankind is futile.
content_old: 12 Give us help against the enemy, for the help of humankind is futile.

content: For the music director. A psalm of David.
content_old: For the music director. A psalm of David.

content: 1 O God of my praise, do not keep silent,
content_old: 1 O God of my praise, do not keep silent,

content: 2 for wicked and deceitful mouths have opened against me. They speak to me with a lying tongue.
content_old: 2 for wicked and deceitful mouths have opened against me. They speak to me with a lying tongue.

content: 3 They also surround me with words of hate, and fight me without cause.
content_old: 3 They also surround me with words of hate, and fight me without cause.

content: 4 In return for my love they accuse me, though I am in prayer.
content_old: 4 In return for my love they accuse me, though I am in prayer.

content: 5 So they inflicted evil against me in return for good and hatred in return for my love.
content_old: 5 So they inflicted evil against me in return for good and hatred in return for my love.

content: 6 Appoint over him a wicked man, and let an accuser stand at his right hand.
content_old: 6 Appoint over him a wicked man, and let an accuser stand at his right hand.

content: 7 When he is judged, let him come out guilty, and let his prayer become as sin.
content_old: 7 When he is judged, let him come out guilty, and let his prayer become as sin.

content: 8 Let his days be few; let another take his office.
content_old: 8 Let his days be few; let another take his office.

content: 9 Let his children be orphans, and his wife a widow,
content_old: 9 Let his children be orphans, and his wife a widow,

content: 10 and let his children wander aimlessly and beg, and let them plead from their ruins.
content_old: 10 and let his children wander aimlessly and beg, and let them plead from their ruins.

content: 11 Let the creditor seize all that is his, and let strangers plunder his property.
content_old: 11 Let the creditor seize all that is his, and let strangers plunder his property.

content: 12 Let there be none who extend to him loyal love, nor any who pities his orphans.
content_old: 12 Let there be none who extend to him loyal love, nor any who pities his orphans.

content: 13 Let his descendants be cut off. Let their name be blotted out in the next generation.
content_old: 13 Let his descendants be cut off. Let their name be blotted out in the next generation.

content: 14 Let the iniquity of his ancestors be remembered before Yahweh, and let the sin of his mother not be blotted out.
content_old: 14 Let the iniquity of his ancestors be remembered before Yahweh, and let the sin of his mother not be blotted out.

content: 15 Let them be before Yahweh continually, that he may cut off their memory from the earth,
content_old: 15 Let them be before Yahweh continually, that he may cut off their memory from the earth,

content: 16 because he did not remember to show loyal love, but he pursued anyone, poor or needy or brokenhearted, to slay them.
content_old: 16 because he did not remember to show loyal love, but he pursued anyone, poor or needy or brokenhearted, to slay them.

content: 17 Because he loved cursing, let it come upon him. Because he did not delight in blessing, let it be far from him.
content_old: 17 Because he loved cursing, let it come upon him. Because he did not delight in blessing, let it be far from him.

content: 18 Because he wore a curse as his robe, let it enter his body like water, and into his bones like oil.
content_old: 18 Because he wore a curse as his robe, let it enter his body like water, and into his bones like oil.

content: 19 May it be for him like a garment in which he wraps, and a belt he continually wears.
content_old: 19 May it be for him like a garment in which he wraps, and a belt he continually wears.

content: 20 Let this be the punishment for my accusers from Yahweh, even those who speak evil against my life.
content_old: 20 Let this be the punishment for my accusers from Yahweh, even those who speak evil against my life.

content: 21 But you, O Yahweh my Lord, deal with me for your name’s sake. Because your loyal love is good, deliver me,
content_old: 21 But you, O Yahweh my Lord, deal with me for your name’s sake. Because your loyal love is good, deliver me,

content: 22 for I am poor and needy, and my heart is wounded within me.
content_old: 22 for I am poor and needy, and my heart is wounded within me.

content: 23 Like a lengthening shadow I am passing away; I am shaken off like a locust.
content_old: 23 Like a lengthening shadow I am passing away; I am shaken off like a locust.

content: 24 My knees buckle from fasting, and my body grows lean without fat.
content_old: 24 My knees buckle from fasting, and my body grows lean without fat.

content: 25 And so I am a disgrace to them; when they see me, they shake their heads.
content_old: 25 And so I am a disgrace to them; when they see me, they shake their heads.

content: 26 Help me, O Yahweh my God; save me according to your loyal love,
content_old: 26 Help me, O Yahweh my God; save me according to your loyal love,

content: 27 that they may know that this is your hand, that you, O Yahweh, you have done it.
content_old: 27 that they may know that this is your hand, that you, O Yahweh, you have done it.

content: 28 Let them curse, but you bless. When they arise, let them be put to shame, that your servant may be glad.
content_old: 28 Let them curse, but you bless. When they arise, let them be put to shame, that your servant may be glad.

content: 29 Let my accusers put on disgrace, and let them cover themselves with their shame as with a robe.
content_old: 29 Let my accusers put on disgrace, and let them cover themselves with their shame as with a robe.

content: 30 I will give thanks to Yahweh exceedingly with my mouth, and in the midst of many I will praise him,
content_old: 30 I will give thanks to Yahweh exceedingly with my mouth, and in the midst of many I will praise him,

content: Of David. A psalm.
content_old: Of David. A psalm.

content: 1 A declaration of Yahweh to my lord, “Sit at my right hand until I make your enemies your footstool.”
content_old: 1 A declaration of Yahweh to my lord, “Sit at my right hand until I make your enemies your footstool.”

content: 2 Yahweh will send out your mighty scepter from Zion; rule in the midst of your enemies.
content_old: 2 Yahweh will send out your mighty scepter from Zion; rule in the midst of your enemies.

content: 3 Your people will volunteer in the day of your power. In holy splendor, from the womb of the dawn, you will have the dew of your youth.
content_old: 3 Your people will volunteer in the day of your power. In holy splendor, from the womb of the dawn, you will have the dew of your youth.

content: 4 Yahweh has sworn and he will not change his mind, “You are a priest forever according to the manner of Melchizedek.”
content_old: 4 Yahweh has sworn and he will not change his mind, “You are a priest forever according to the manner of Melchizedek.”

content: 5 O Lord, at your right hand he will shatter kings in the day of his anger.
content_old: 5 O Lord, at your right hand he will shatter kings in the day of his anger.

content: 6 He will judge among the nations; he will fill them with corpses. He will shatter the rulers of many countries.
content_old: 6 He will judge among the nations; he will fill them with corpses. He will shatter the rulers of many countries.

content: 1 Praise Yah! I will give thanks to Yahweh with all my heart, in the assembly of the upright and the congregation.
content_old: 1 Praise Yah! I will give thanks to Yahweh with all my heart, in the assembly of the upright and the congregation.

content: 2 The works of Yahweh are great, studied by all who delight in them.
content_old: 2 The works of Yahweh are great, studied by all who delight in them.

content: 3 Full of splendor and majesty is his work, and his righteousness endures forever.
content_old: 3 Full of splendor and majesty is his work, and his righteousness endures forever.

content: 4 He has made his wonders to be remembered; Yahweh is gracious and compassionate.
content_old: 4 He has made his wonders to be remembered; Yahweh is gracious and compassionate.

content: 5 He gives food to those who fear him; he remembers his covenant forever.
content_old: 5 He gives food to those who fear him; he remembers his covenant forever.

content: 6 He has declared the power of his works for his people, by giving to them the inheritance of the nations.
content_old: 6 He has declared the power of his works for his people, by giving to them the inheritance of the nations.

content: 7 The works of his hands are faithfulness and justice; all his precepts are reliable.
content_old: 7 The works of his hands are faithfulness and justice; all his precepts are reliable.

content: 8 They are sustained forever and ever, done with faithfulness and uprightness.
content_old: 8 They are sustained forever and ever, done with faithfulness and uprightness.

content: 9 He has sent redemption to his people; he has commanded his covenant forever; holy and fearful is his name.
content_old: 9 He has sent redemption to his people; he has commanded his covenant forever; holy and fearful is his name.

content: 1 Praise Yah! Blessed is the man who fears Yahweh; he takes great delight in his commands.
content_old: 1 Praise Yah! Blessed is the man who fears Yahweh; he takes great delight in his commands.

content: 2 His descendants will be mighty in the land; the generation of the upright will be blessed.
content_old: 2 His descendants will be mighty in the land; the generation of the upright will be blessed.

content: 3 Wealth and riches are in his house, and his righteousness endures forever.
content_old: 3 Wealth and riches are in his house, and his righteousness endures forever.

content: 4 His light rises in the darkness for the upright; he is gracious and compassionate and righteous.
content_old: 4 His light rises in the darkness for the upright; he is gracious and compassionate and righteous.

content: 5 It goes well for a man who is gracious and lends, who conducts his business properly.
content_old: 5 It goes well for a man who is gracious and lends, who conducts his business properly.

content: 6 For he will not be shaken forever; the righteous will be remembered forever.
content_old: 6 For he will not be shaken forever; the righteous will be remembered forever.

content: 7 He is not afraid of bad news; his heart is steadfast, secure in Yahweh.
content_old: 7 He is not afraid of bad news; his heart is steadfast, secure in Yahweh.

content: 8 His heart is sustained; he will not be afraid, until he looks in triumph on his enemies.
content_old: 8 His heart is sustained; he will not be afraid, until he looks in triumph on his enemies.

content: 9 He gives lavishly to the needy; his righteousness endures forever. His horn rises high in honor.
content_old: 9 He gives lavishly to the needy; his righteousness endures forever. His horn rises high in honor.

content: 1 Praise Yah! Praise, O servants of Yahweh, praise the name of Yahweh.
content_old: 1 Praise Yah! Praise, O servants of Yahweh, praise the name of Yahweh.

content: 2 Let the name of Yahweh be blessed, from now until forever.
content_old: 2 Let the name of Yahweh be blessed, from now until forever.

content: 3 From the rising of the sun to its setting, let the name of Yahweh be blessed.
content_old: 3 From the rising of the sun to its setting, let the name of Yahweh be blessed.

content: 4 Yahweh is high above all nations; his glory is above the heavens.
content_old: 4 Yahweh is high above all nations; his glory is above the heavens.

content: 5 Who is like Yahweh our God, who is enthroned on high,
content_old: 5 Who is like Yahweh our God, who is enthroned on high,

content: 6 who condescends to look at what is in the heavens and in the earth?
content_old: 6 who condescends to look at what is in the heavens and in the earth?

content: 7 He raises the helpless from the dust; he lifts the needy from the ash heap,
content_old: 7 He raises the helpless from the dust; he lifts the needy from the ash heap,

content: 8 to seat them with princes, with the princes of his people.
content_old: 8 to seat them with princes, with the princes of his people.

content: 1 When Israel went out from Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of a strange language,
content_old: 1 When Israel went out from Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of a strange language,

content: 2 Judah became his sanctuary, Israel his dominion.
content_old: 2 Judah became his sanctuary, Israel his dominion.

content: 3 The sea looked and fled; the Jordan turned back.
content_old: 3 The sea looked and fled; the Jordan turned back.

content: 4 The mountains skipped like rams, the hills like lambs.
content_old: 4 The mountains skipped like rams, the hills like lambs.

content: 5 What’s with you, O sea, that you fled? O Jordan, that you turned back?
content_old: 5 What’s with you, O sea, that you fled? O Jordan, that you turned back?

content: 6 O mountains, that you skipped like rams? O hills, like lambs?
content_old: 6 O mountains, that you skipped like rams? O hills, like lambs?

content: 7 At the presence of the Lord writhe, O earth, at the presence of the God of Jacob,
content_old: 7 At the presence of the Lord writhe, O earth, at the presence of the God of Jacob,

content: 1 Not to us, O Yahweh, not to us, but to your name give glory, because of your loyal love, because of your faithfulness.
content_old: 1 Not to us, O Yahweh, not to us, but to your name give glory, because of your loyal love, because of your faithfulness.

content: 2 Why should the nations say, “Where, pray tell, is their God?”
content_old: 2 Why should the nations say, “Where, pray tell, is their God?”

content: 3 But our God is in the heavens; all that he desires, he does.
content_old: 3 But our God is in the heavens; all that he desires, he does.

content: 4 Their idols are silver and gold, the work of human hands.
content_old: 4 Their idols are silver and gold, the work of human hands.

content: 5 They have mouths, but cannot speak; they have eyes, but cannot see;
content_old: 5 They have mouths, but cannot speak; they have eyes, but cannot see;

content: 6 they have ears, but cannot hear; they have noses, but cannot smell;
content_old: 6 they have ears, but cannot hear; they have noses, but cannot smell;

content: 7 they have their hands, but they cannot feel, their feet, but they cannot walk; they cannot utter a sound in their throats.
content_old: 7 they have their hands, but they cannot feel, their feet, but they cannot walk; they cannot utter a sound in their throats.

content: 8 Those who make them become like them, as does everyone who trusts in them.
content_old: 8 Those who make them become like them, as does everyone who trusts in them.

content: 9 O Israel, trust Yahweh; he is their help and their shield.
content_old: 9 O Israel, trust Yahweh; he is their help and their shield.

content: 10 O house of Aaron, trust in Yahweh; he is their help and their shield.
content_old: 10 O house of Aaron, trust in Yahweh; he is their help and their shield.

content: 11 You who fear Yahweh, trust in Yahweh; he is their help and their shield.
content_old: 11 You who fear Yahweh, trust in Yahweh; he is their help and their shield.

content: 12 Yahweh remembers us; he will bless us. He will bless the house of Israel; he will bless the house of Aaron.
content_old: 12 Yahweh remembers us; he will bless us. He will bless the house of Israel; he will bless the house of Aaron.

content: 13 He will bless those who fear Yahweh, the small with the great.
content_old: 13 He will bless those who fear Yahweh, the small with the great.

content: 14 May Yahweh give you increase, you and your children.
content_old: 14 May Yahweh give you increase, you and your children.

content: 15 May you be blessed by Yahweh, who made heaven and earth.
content_old: 15 May you be blessed by Yahweh, who made heaven and earth.

content: 16 The heavens are Yahweh’s heavens, but the earth he has given to the children of humankind.
content_old: 16 The heavens are Yahweh’s heavens, but the earth he has given to the children of humankind.

content: 17 The dead do not praise Yah, nor any descending into silence.
content_old: 17 The dead do not praise Yah, nor any descending into silence.

content: 1 I love him, because Yahweh has heard the voice of my supplications.
content_old: 1 I love him, because Yahweh has heard the voice of my supplications.

content: 2 Because he has inclined his ear to me, I will call all my days.
content_old: 2 Because he has inclined his ear to me, I will call all my days.

content: 3 The ropes of death encircled me, and the distresses of Sheol found me. I found trouble and grief.
content_old: 3 The ropes of death encircled me, and the distresses of Sheol found me. I found trouble and grief.

content: 4 Then I called on the name of Yahweh: “O Yahweh, please save my life!”
content_old: 4 Then I called on the name of Yahweh: “O Yahweh, please save my life!”

content: 5 Gracious is Yahweh and righteous, and our God is merciful.
content_old: 5 Gracious is Yahweh and righteous, and our God is merciful.

content: 6 Yahweh watches over the simple. I was brought low, but he gave me victory.
content_old: 6 Yahweh watches over the simple. I was brought low, but he gave me victory.

content: 7 Return, O my soul, to your repose, for Yahweh has dealt bountifully with you.
content_old: 7 Return, O my soul, to your repose, for Yahweh has dealt bountifully with you.

content: 8 For you have rescued me from death, my eyes from tears, my feet from stumbling.
content_old: 8 For you have rescued me from death, my eyes from tears, my feet from stumbling.

content: 9 I will walk before Yahweh in the land of the living.
content_old: 9 I will walk before Yahweh in the land of the living.

content: 10 I believed when I spoke, “I am afflicted greatly.”
content_old: 10 I believed when I spoke, “I am afflicted greatly.”

content: 11 I said in my haste, “Everyone is a liar.”
content_old: 11 I said in my haste, “Everyone is a liar.”

content: 12 What shall I give back to Yahweh for all his benefits to me?
content_old: 12 What shall I give back to Yahweh for all his benefits to me?

content: 13 I will lift up the cup of salvation and proclaim the name of Yahweh.
content_old: 13 I will lift up the cup of salvation and proclaim the name of Yahweh.

content: 14 I will pay my vows made to Yahweh in the presence of all his people.
content_old: 14 I will pay my vows made to Yahweh in the presence of all his people.

content: 15 Costly in Yahweh’s view is the death of his faithful ones.
content_old: 15 Costly in Yahweh’s view is the death of his faithful ones.

content: 16 Ah, Yahweh, I am indeed your servant; I am your servant, the child of your maidservant. You have loosed my bonds.
content_old: 16 Ah, Yahweh, I am indeed your servant; I am your servant, the child of your maidservant. You have loosed my bonds.

content: 17 I will offer to you a sacrifice of thanksgiving, and proclaim the name of Yahweh.
content_old: 17 I will offer to you a sacrifice of thanksgiving, and proclaim the name of Yahweh.

content: 18 I will pay my vows made to Yahweh in the presence of all his people,
content_old: 18 I will pay my vows made to Yahweh in the presence of all his people,

content: 1 Praise Yahweh, all you nations; extol him, all you peoples.
content_old: 1 Praise Yahweh, all you nations; extol him, all you peoples.

content: 1 Give thanks to Yahweh for he is good, for his loyal love is forever.
content_old: 1 Give thanks to Yahweh for he is good, for his loyal love is forever.

content: 2 Let Israel say, “His loyal love is forever.”
content_old: 2 Let Israel say, “His loyal love is forever.”

content: 3 Let the house of Aaron say, “His loyal love is forever.”
content_old: 3 Let the house of Aaron say, “His loyal love is forever.”

content: 4 Let those who fear Yahweh say, “His loyal love is forever.”
content_old: 4 Let those who fear Yahweh say, “His loyal love is forever.”

content: 5 Out of my distress I called to Yah. Yah answered me, setting me in a broad place.
content_old: 5 Out of my distress I called to Yah. Yah answered me, setting me in a broad place.

content: 6 Yahweh is for me; I do not fear. What can mere humans do to me?
content_old: 6 Yahweh is for me; I do not fear. What can mere humans do to me?

content: 7 Yahweh is for me as my helper, and so I will look in triumph on those who hate me.
content_old: 7 Yahweh is for me as my helper, and so I will look in triumph on those who hate me.

content: 8 It is better to take refuge in Yahweh than to trust in humans.
content_old: 8 It is better to take refuge in Yahweh than to trust in humans.

content: 9 It is better to take refuge in Yahweh than to trust princes.
content_old: 9 It is better to take refuge in Yahweh than to trust princes.

content: 10 All nations surrounded me. In the name of Yahweh I opposed them indeed.
content_old: 10 All nations surrounded me. In the name of Yahweh I opposed them indeed.

content: 11 They surrounded me; yes, they surrounded me. In the name of Yahweh I opposed them indeed.
content_old: 11 They surrounded me; yes, they surrounded me. In the name of Yahweh I opposed them indeed.

content: 12 They surrounded me like bees; they were extinguished like a fire of thorns. In the name of Yahweh I opposed them indeed.
content_old: 12 They surrounded me like bees; they were extinguished like a fire of thorns. In the name of Yahweh I opposed them indeed.

content: 13 You pushed me hard to make me fall, but Yahweh helped me.
content_old: 13 You pushed me hard to make me fall, but Yahweh helped me.

content: 14 Yah is my strength and my song, and he has become my salvation.
content_old: 14 Yah is my strength and my song, and he has become my salvation.

content: 15 The sound of rejoicing and salvation is in the tents of the righteous; the right hand of Yahweh has done valiantly.
content_old: 15 The sound of rejoicing and salvation is in the tents of the righteous; the right hand of Yahweh has done valiantly.

content: 16 The right hand of Yahweh has exalted; the right hand of Yahweh has done valiantly.
content_old: 16 The right hand of Yahweh has exalted; the right hand of Yahweh has done valiantly.

content: 17 I will not die but live, and tell of the works of Yah.
content_old: 17 I will not die but live, and tell of the works of Yah.

content: 18 Yah has disciplined me severely, but he did not consign me to death.
content_old: 18 Yah has disciplined me severely, but he did not consign me to death.

content: 19 Open to me the gates of righteousness, that I may enter through them and give thanks to Yah.
content_old: 19 Open to me the gates of righteousness, that I may enter through them and give thanks to Yah.

content: 20 This is the gate of Yahweh, through which the righteous will enter.
content_old: 20 This is the gate of Yahweh, through which the righteous will enter.

content: 21 I will give thanks to you for you have answered me, and you have become my salvation.
content_old: 21 I will give thanks to you for you have answered me, and you have become my salvation.

content: 22 The stone the builders rejected has become the chief cornerstone.
content_old: 22 The stone the builders rejected has become the chief cornerstone.

content: 23 This is from Yahweh; it is wonderful in our eyes.
content_old: 23 This is from Yahweh; it is wonderful in our eyes.

content: 24 This is the day Yahweh has worked; let us rejoice and be glad in him.
content_old: 24 This is the day Yahweh has worked; let us rejoice and be glad in him.

content: 25 O Yahweh, please save; O Yahweh, please grant success.
content_old: 25 O Yahweh, please save; O Yahweh, please grant success.

content: 26 Blessed is he who comes in the name of Yahweh. We bless you from the house of Yahweh.
content_old: 26 Blessed is he who comes in the name of Yahweh. We bless you from the house of Yahweh.

content: 27 Yahweh is God, and he has given us light. Bind the festal sacrifice with cords to the horns of the altar.
content_old: 27 Yahweh is God, and he has given us light. Bind the festal sacrifice with cords to the horns of the altar.

content: 28 You are my God, and I will give thanks to you. You are my God; I will exalt you.
content_old: 28 You are my God, and I will give thanks to you. You are my God; I will exalt you.

content: 1 Blessed are those whose way is blameless, who walk in the law of Yahweh.
content_old: 1 Blessed are those whose way is blameless, who walk in the law of Yahweh.

content: 2 Blessed are those who keep his testimonies; they seek him with a whole heart.
content_old: 2 Blessed are those who keep his testimonies; they seek him with a whole heart.

content: 3 They also do no wrong; they walk in his ways.
content_old: 3 They also do no wrong; they walk in his ways.

content: 4 You have commanded your precepts, that we should keep them diligently.
content_old: 4 You have commanded your precepts, that we should keep them diligently.

content: 5 Oh that my ways were steadfast, to keep your statutes!
content_old: 5 Oh that my ways were steadfast, to keep your statutes!

content: 6 Then I would not be ashamed when I look to all your commands.
content_old: 6 Then I would not be ashamed when I look to all your commands.

content: 7 I will give you thanks with an upright heart, when I learn your righteous laws.
content_old: 7 I will give you thanks with an upright heart, when I learn your righteous laws.

content: 8 I will heed your statutes; do not utterly forsake me.
content_old: 8 I will heed your statutes; do not utterly forsake me.

content: 9 How can a young man keep his way pure? By taking heed according to your word.
content_old: 9 How can a young man keep his way pure? By taking heed according to your word.

content: 10 With my whole heart I have sought you; do not let me stray from your commands.
content_old: 10 With my whole heart I have sought you; do not let me stray from your commands.

content: 11 In my heart I have hidden your word, so that I may not sin against you.
content_old: 11 In my heart I have hidden your word, so that I may not sin against you.

content: 12 Blessed are you, O Yahweh. Teach me your statutes.
content_old: 12 Blessed are you, O Yahweh. Teach me your statutes.

content: 13 With my lips I have told of all the ordinances of your mouth.
content_old: 13 With my lips I have told of all the ordinances of your mouth.

content: 14 In the way of your testimonies I have rejoiced as I would over all riches.
content_old: 14 In the way of your testimonies I have rejoiced as I would over all riches.

content: 15 I will meditate on your precepts and look at your ways.
content_old: 15 I will meditate on your precepts and look at your ways.

content: 16 I will take delight in your statutes; I will not forget your word.
content_old: 16 I will take delight in your statutes; I will not forget your word.

content: 17 Deal bountifully with your servant, that I may live and heed your word.
content_old: 17 Deal bountifully with your servant, that I may live and heed your word.

content: 18 Uncover my eyes, that I may look at wonderful things from your law.
content_old: 18 Uncover my eyes, that I may look at wonderful things from your law.

content: 19 I am a sojourner on the earth; do not hide your commands from me.
content_old: 19 I am a sojourner on the earth; do not hide your commands from me.

content: 20 My soul is crushed with longing for your ordinances at all times.
content_old: 20 My soul is crushed with longing for your ordinances at all times.

content: 21 You rebuke the arrogant, the accursed, who stray from your commands.
content_old: 21 You rebuke the arrogant, the accursed, who stray from your commands.

content: 22 Remove from me scorn and contempt, for I have kept your testimonies.
content_old: 22 Remove from me scorn and contempt, for I have kept your testimonies.

content: 23 Even though princes sit and speak against me, your servant meditates on your statutes.
content_old: 23 Even though princes sit and speak against me, your servant meditates on your statutes.

content: 24 Your testimonies are my delight, my counselors.
content_old: 24 Your testimonies are my delight, my counselors.

content: 25 My soul clings to the dust; revive me according to your word.
content_old: 25 My soul clings to the dust; revive me according to your word.

content: 26 I told of my ways, and you answered me; teach me your statutes.
content_old: 26 I told of my ways, and you answered me; teach me your statutes.

content: 27 Make me understand the way of your precepts, that I may meditate on your wonderful things.
content_old: 27 Make me understand the way of your precepts, that I may meditate on your wonderful things.

content: 28 My soul weeps because of grief; strengthen me according to your word.
content_old: 28 My soul weeps because of grief; strengthen me according to your word.

content: 29 Remove from me the deceptive way, and graciously give me your law.
content_old: 29 Remove from me the deceptive way, and graciously give me your law.

content: 30 I have chosen the faithful way; I have set your ordinances before me.
content_old: 30 I have chosen the faithful way; I have set your ordinances before me.

content: 31 I cling to your testimonies; O Yahweh, do not let me be put to shame.
content_old: 31 I cling to your testimonies; O Yahweh, do not let me be put to shame.

content: 32 I will run the way of your commands, for you will enlarge my heart.
content_old: 32 I will run the way of your commands, for you will enlarge my heart.

content: 33 Teach me, O Yahweh, the way of your statutes, and I will keep it to the end.
content_old: 33 Teach me, O Yahweh, the way of your statutes, and I will keep it to the end.

content: 34 Give me understanding, that I may keep your law and heed it with my whole heart.
content_old: 34 Give me understanding, that I may keep your law and heed it with my whole heart.

content: 35 Cause me to walk in the path of your commands, for I delight in it.
content_old: 35 Cause me to walk in the path of your commands, for I delight in it.

content: 36 Incline my heart to your testimonies, and not to dishonest gain.
content_old: 36 Incline my heart to your testimonies, and not to dishonest gain.

content: 37 Turn away my eyes from looking at what is worthless; revive me in your ways.
content_old: 37 Turn away my eyes from looking at what is worthless; revive me in your ways.

content: 38 Fulfill your word to your servant, which is to bring about a reverence for you.
content_old: 38 Fulfill your word to your servant, which is to bring about a reverence for you.

content: 39 Turn away my disgrace that I dread, for your ordinances are good.
content_old: 39 Turn away my disgrace that I dread, for your ordinances are good.

content: 40 Look, I have longed for your precepts; revive me in your righteousness.
content_old: 40 Look, I have longed for your precepts; revive me in your righteousness.

content: 41 Let your acts of loyal love also come to me, O Yahweh, your salvation according to your word.
content_old: 41 Let your acts of loyal love also come to me, O Yahweh, your salvation according to your word.

content: 42 Then I will have an answer for the one who taunts me, for I trust your word.
content_old: 42 Then I will have an answer for the one who taunts me, for I trust your word.

content: 43 And do not snatch the word of truth utterly from my mouth, for I hope in your ordinances.
content_old: 43 And do not snatch the word of truth utterly from my mouth, for I hope in your ordinances.

content: 44 So I will heed your law continually, forever and ever.
content_old: 44 So I will heed your law continually, forever and ever.

content: 45 And I will go about freely, for I have sought your precepts.
content_old: 45 And I will go about freely, for I have sought your precepts.

content: 46 And I will speak of your testimonies before kings, and will not be ashamed.
content_old: 46 And I will speak of your testimonies before kings, and will not be ashamed.

content: 47 And I will take delight in your commands, which I love.
content_old: 47 And I will take delight in your commands, which I love.

content: 48 And I will lift up my hands to your commands, which I love, and I will meditate on your statutes.
content_old: 48 And I will lift up my hands to your commands, which I love, and I will meditate on your statutes.

content: 49 Remember your word to your servant, upon which you have caused me to hope.
content_old: 49 Remember your word to your servant, upon which you have caused me to hope.

content: 50 This is my comfort in my misery: that your word preserves my life.
content_old: 50 This is my comfort in my misery: that your word preserves my life.

content: 51 The arrogant utterly deride me; I have not turned aside from your law.
content_old: 51 The arrogant utterly deride me; I have not turned aside from your law.

content: 52 I remember your ordinances of old, O Yahweh, and I take comfort.
content_old: 52 I remember your ordinances of old, O Yahweh, and I take comfort.

content: 53 Rage seizes me because of the wicked, those who forsake your law.
content_old: 53 Rage seizes me because of the wicked, those who forsake your law.

content: 54 Your statutes have been my songs in the house of my sojourning.
content_old: 54 Your statutes have been my songs in the house of my sojourning.

content: 55 I remember your name in the night, O Yahweh, and I heed your law.
content_old: 55 I remember your name in the night, O Yahweh, and I heed your law.

content: 56 This has been mine, that I have kept your precepts.
content_old: 56 This has been mine, that I have kept your precepts.

content: 57 Yahweh is my portion; I intend to heed your words.
content_old: 57 Yahweh is my portion; I intend to heed your words.

content: 58 I seek your favor with my whole heart; be gracious to me according to your word.
content_old: 58 I seek your favor with my whole heart; be gracious to me according to your word.

content: 59 I think about my ways, and turn my feet to your testimonies.
content_old: 59 I think about my ways, and turn my feet to your testimonies.

content: 60 I hurry and do not delay to heed your commands.
content_old: 60 I hurry and do not delay to heed your commands.

content: 61 The cords of the wicked surround me, but I do not forget your law.
content_old: 61 The cords of the wicked surround me, but I do not forget your law.

content: 62 In the middle of the night I rise to give you thanks, because of your righteous ordinances.
content_old: 62 In the middle of the night I rise to give you thanks, because of your righteous ordinances.

content: 63 I am a companion of all who fear you and heed your precepts.
content_old: 63 I am a companion of all who fear you and heed your precepts.

content: 64 The earth, O Yahweh, is full of your loyal love. Teach me your statutes.
content_old: 64 The earth, O Yahweh, is full of your loyal love. Teach me your statutes.

content: 65 You have dealt well with your servant, O Yahweh, according to your word.
content_old: 65 You have dealt well with your servant, O Yahweh, according to your word.

content: 66 Teach me good discernment and knowledge, for I believe your commands.
content_old: 66 Teach me good discernment and knowledge, for I believe your commands.

content: 67 Before I was afflicted, I was going astray, but now I heed your word.
content_old: 67 Before I was afflicted, I was going astray, but now I heed your word.

content: 68 You are good and do good; teach me your statutes.
content_old: 68 You are good and do good; teach me your statutes.

content: 69 The arrogant smear me with lies; I keep your precepts with my whole heart.
content_old: 69 The arrogant smear me with lies; I keep your precepts with my whole heart.

content: 70 Their heart is insensitive like fat; As for me, I take delight in your law.
content_old: 70 Their heart is insensitive like fat; As for me, I take delight in your law.

content: 71 It is good for me that I was afflicted, so that I might learn your statutes.
content_old: 71 It is good for me that I was afflicted, so that I might learn your statutes.

content: 72 The law of your mouth is better to me than thousands of gold and silver coins.
content_old: 72 The law of your mouth is better to me than thousands of gold and silver coins.

content: 73 Your hands have made me and established me; give me understanding that I may learn your commands.
content_old: 73 Your hands have made me and established me; give me understanding that I may learn your commands.

content: 74 Those who fear you will see me and be glad, because I hope in your word.
content_old: 74 Those who fear you will see me and be glad, because I hope in your word.

content: 75 I know, O Yahweh, that your judgments are right, and that in faithfulness you afflicted me.
content_old: 75 I know, O Yahweh, that your judgments are right, and that in faithfulness you afflicted me.

content: 76 Please let your loyal love comfort me, according to your word to your servant.
content_old: 76 Please let your loyal love comfort me, according to your word to your servant.

content: 77 Let your mercies come to me, that I may live, for your law is my delight.
content_old: 77 Let your mercies come to me, that I may live, for your law is my delight.

content: 78 Let the arrogant be put to shame, because they have wronged me with lies. As for me, I will meditate on your precepts.
content_old: 78 Let the arrogant be put to shame, because they have wronged me with lies. As for me, I will meditate on your precepts.

content: 79 Let those who fear you turn to me, even those who know your testimonies.
content_old: 79 Let those who fear you turn to me, even those who know your testimonies.

content: 80 May my heart be blameless in your statutes, so that I may not be ashamed.
content_old: 80 May my heart be blameless in your statutes, so that I may not be ashamed.

content: 81 My soul languishes for your salvation; I hope in your word.
content_old: 81 My soul languishes for your salvation; I hope in your word.

content: 82 My eyes long for your word, saying, “When will you comfort me?”
content_old: 82 My eyes long for your word, saying, “When will you comfort me?”

content: 83 For I have become like a wineskin in the smoke, yet I have not forgotten your statutes.
content_old: 83 For I have become like a wineskin in the smoke, yet I have not forgotten your statutes.

content: 84 How many are the days of your servant? When will you execute justice against those who persecute me?
content_old: 84 How many are the days of your servant? When will you execute justice against those who persecute me?

content: 85 The arrogant have dug pits for me, which is not according to your law.
content_old: 85 The arrogant have dug pits for me, which is not according to your law.

content: 86 All your commands are faithful. They persecute me deceitfully; help me!
content_old: 86 All your commands are faithful. They persecute me deceitfully; help me!

content: 87 They have almost destroyed me on the earth, but I have not forsaken your precepts.
content_old: 87 They have almost destroyed me on the earth, but I have not forsaken your precepts.

content: 88 According to your loyal love preserve me alive, so that I may heed the testimony from your mouth.
content_old: 88 According to your loyal love preserve me alive, so that I may heed the testimony from your mouth.

content: 89 Forever, O Yahweh, your word is settled in heaven.
content_old: 89 Forever, O Yahweh, your word is settled in heaven.

content: 90 Your faithfulness endures throughout all generations. You have established the earth and it stands.
content_old: 90 Your faithfulness endures throughout all generations. You have established the earth and it stands.

content: 91 By your ordinances they stand today, for all are your servants.
content_old: 91 By your ordinances they stand today, for all are your servants.

content: 92 Unless your law had been my delight, then I would have perished in my misery.
content_old: 92 Unless your law had been my delight, then I would have perished in my misery.

content: 93 I will not ever forget your precepts, for by them you revive me.
content_old: 93 I will not ever forget your precepts, for by them you revive me.

content: 94 I am yours. Save me, for I have sought your precepts.
content_old: 94 I am yours. Save me, for I have sought your precepts.

content: 95 For me the wicked lie in wait to destroy me. I give attention to your testimonies.
content_old: 95 For me the wicked lie in wait to destroy me. I give attention to your testimonies.

content: 96 I have seen a limit to every perfection; your command is very broad.
content_old: 96 I have seen a limit to every perfection; your command is very broad.

content: 97 How I love your law! The whole day it is my meditation.
content_old: 97 How I love your law! The whole day it is my meditation.

content: 98 Your commands make me wiser than my enemies, because they are ever with me.
content_old: 98 Your commands make me wiser than my enemies, because they are ever with me.

content: 99 I have more insight than all my teachers, for your testimonies are my meditation.
content_old: 99 I have more insight than all my teachers, for your testimonies are my meditation.

content: 100 I understand more than the elders, for I keep your precepts.
content_old: 100 I understand more than the elders, for I keep your precepts.

content: 101 I have restrained my feet from every evil way, so that I may heed your word.
content_old: 101 I have restrained my feet from every evil way, so that I may heed your word.

content: 102 I have not turned aside from your ordinances, for you have taught me.
content_old: 102 I have not turned aside from your ordinances, for you have taught me.

content: 103 How smooth are your words to my palate, more than honey in my mouth.
content_old: 103 How smooth are your words to my palate, more than honey in my mouth.

content: 104 From your precepts I get understanding, therefore I hate every false way.
content_old: 104 From your precepts I get understanding, therefore I hate every false way.

content: 105 Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
content_old: 105 Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

content: 106 I have sworn an oath and confirmed it, to heed your righteous ordinances.
content_old: 106 I have sworn an oath and confirmed it, to heed your righteous ordinances.

content: 107 I am very much afflicted; O Yahweh, revive me according to your word.
content_old: 107 I am very much afflicted; O Yahweh, revive me according to your word.

content: 108 Please accept the freewill offerings of my mouth, O Yahweh, and teach me your ordinances.
content_old: 108 Please accept the freewill offerings of my mouth, O Yahweh, and teach me your ordinances.

content: 109 My life is in danger continually, yet I do not forget your law.
content_old: 109 My life is in danger continually, yet I do not forget your law.

content: 110 The wicked have laid a snare for me, yet I do not wander from your precepts.
content_old: 110 The wicked have laid a snare for me, yet I do not wander from your precepts.

content: 111 I have taken as my own your testimonies forever, for they are the joy of my heart.
content_old: 111 I have taken as my own your testimonies forever, for they are the joy of my heart.

content: 112 I have inclined my heart to do your statutes forever, to the end.
content_old: 112 I have inclined my heart to do your statutes forever, to the end.

content: 113 I hate the double-minded, but I love your law.
content_old: 113 I hate the double-minded, but I love your law.

content: 114 You are my hiding place and my shield; I hope in your word.
content_old: 114 You are my hiding place and my shield; I hope in your word.

content: 115 Turn aside from me, you evildoers, for I will keep the commands of my God.
content_old: 115 Turn aside from me, you evildoers, for I will keep the commands of my God.

content: 116 Sustain me according to your word, that I may live, and do not let me be ashamed of my hope.
content_old: 116 Sustain me according to your word, that I may live, and do not let me be ashamed of my hope.

content: 117 Uphold me, that I may be delivered, and have regard for your statutes continually.
content_old: 117 Uphold me, that I may be delivered, and have regard for your statutes continually.

content: 118 You reject all who stray from your statutes, for their deceit is a breach of faith.
content_old: 118 You reject all who stray from your statutes, for their deceit is a breach of faith.

content: 119 You remove all the wicked of the earth like dross, therefore I love your testimonies.
content_old: 119 You remove all the wicked of the earth like dross, therefore I love your testimonies.

content: 120 My flesh trembles for fear of you, and I am afraid of your judgments.
content_old: 120 My flesh trembles for fear of you, and I am afraid of your judgments.

content: 121 I have done justice and righteousness; do not leave me to my oppressors.
content_old: 121 I have done justice and righteousness; do not leave me to my oppressors.

content: 122 Pledge good for your servant; do not let the arrogant oppress me.
content_old: 122 Pledge good for your servant; do not let the arrogant oppress me.

content: 123 My eyes long for your salvation, and your righteous word.
content_old: 123 My eyes long for your salvation, and your righteous word.

content: 124 Deal with your servant according to your loyal love, and teach me your statutes.
content_old: 124 Deal with your servant according to your loyal love, and teach me your statutes.

content: 125 I am your servant; give me understanding, that I may know your statutes.
content_old: 125 I am your servant; give me understanding, that I may know your statutes.

content: 126 It is time for Yahweh to act, for they have broken your law.
content_old: 126 It is time for Yahweh to act, for they have broken your law.

content: 127 Therefore I love your commands more than gold, even fine gold.
content_old: 127 Therefore I love your commands more than gold, even fine gold.

content: 128 Therefore all your precepts of everything I regard as right; I hate every false way.
content_old: 128 Therefore all your precepts of everything I regard as right; I hate every false way.

content: 129 Your testimonies are miracles, therefore my soul keeps them.
content_old: 129 Your testimonies are miracles, therefore my soul keeps them.

content: 130 The unfolding of your words gives light, giving understanding to the simple.
content_old: 130 The unfolding of your words gives light, giving understanding to the simple.

content: 131 I open my mouth and pant, because I long for your commands.
content_old: 131 I open my mouth and pant, because I long for your commands.

content: 132 Turn to me and be gracious to me, as is proper for those who love your name.
content_old: 132 Turn to me and be gracious to me, as is proper for those who love your name.

content: 133 Direct my steps in your word, and do not let any iniquity gain power over me.
content_old: 133 Direct my steps in your word, and do not let any iniquity gain power over me.

content: 134 Redeem me from the oppression of humankind, that I may heed your precepts.
content_old: 134 Redeem me from the oppression of humankind, that I may heed your precepts.

content: 135 Shine your face on your servant, and teach me your statutes.
content_old: 135 Shine your face on your servant, and teach me your statutes.

content: 136 Streams of water flow down from my eyes, because people do not heed your law.
content_old: 136 Streams of water flow down from my eyes, because people do not heed your law.

content: 137 You are righteous, O Yahweh, and your ordinances are upright.
content_old: 137 You are righteous, O Yahweh, and your ordinances are upright.

content: 138 You have ordained your testimonies in righteousness, and in exceeding faithfulness.
content_old: 138 You have ordained your testimonies in righteousness, and in exceeding faithfulness.

content: 139 My zeal consumes me, because my enemies have forgotten your words.
content_old: 139 My zeal consumes me, because my enemies have forgotten your words.

content: 140 Your word is very pure, and your servant loves it.
content_old: 140 Your word is very pure, and your servant loves it.

content: 141 I am small and despised, yet I do not forget your precepts.
content_old: 141 I am small and despised, yet I do not forget your precepts.

content: 142 Your righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, and your law is truth.
content_old: 142 Your righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, and your law is truth.

content: 143 Trouble and anguish have found me; your commands delight me.
content_old: 143 Trouble and anguish have found me; your commands delight me.

content: 144 The righteousness of your testimonies is forever; give me understanding that I may live.
content_old: 144 The righteousness of your testimonies is forever; give me understanding that I may live.

content: 145 I call with my whole heart; answer me, O Yahweh. I will keep your statutes.
content_old: 145 I call with my whole heart; answer me, O Yahweh. I will keep your statutes.

content: 146 I call to you. Save me, and I will heed your testimonies.
content_old: 146 I call to you. Save me, and I will heed your testimonies.

content: 147 I rise early in the dawn and cry for help; I hope in your word.
content_old: 147 I rise early in the dawn and cry for help; I hope in your word.

content: 148 My eyes anticipate the night watches, that I may meditate on your word.
content_old: 148 My eyes anticipate the night watches, that I may meditate on your word.

content: 149 Hear my voice according to your loyal love; O Yahweh, preserve my life according to your justice.
content_old: 149 Hear my voice according to your loyal love; O Yahweh, preserve my life according to your justice.

content: 150 Those who pursue a wicked purpose draw near; they are far from your law.
content_old: 150 Those who pursue a wicked purpose draw near; they are far from your law.

content: 151 You are near, O Yahweh, and all your commands are truth.
content_old: 151 You are near, O Yahweh, and all your commands are truth.

content: 152 Concerning your testimonies, I knew long ago that you have established them forever.
content_old: 152 Concerning your testimonies, I knew long ago that you have established them forever.

content: 153 See my misery and rescue me, for I do not forget your law.
content_old: 153 See my misery and rescue me, for I do not forget your law.

content: 154 Plead my cause and redeem me; preserve my life according to your word.
content_old: 154 Plead my cause and redeem me; preserve my life according to your word.

content: 155 Salvation is far from the wicked, for they do not seek your statutes.
content_old: 155 Salvation is far from the wicked, for they do not seek your statutes.

content: 156 Your mercies are great, O Yahweh; preserve my life according to your ordinances.
content_old: 156 Your mercies are great, O Yahweh; preserve my life according to your ordinances.

content: 157 My persecutors and enemies are many, yet I do not turn aside from your testimonies.
content_old: 157 My persecutors and enemies are many, yet I do not turn aside from your testimonies.

content: 158 I see the treacherous and I feel disgust, because they do not heed your word.
content_old: 158 I see the treacherous and I feel disgust, because they do not heed your word.

content: 159 Consider that I love your precepts; O Yahweh, according to your loyal love preserve my life.
content_old: 159 Consider that I love your precepts; O Yahweh, according to your loyal love preserve my life.

content: 160 The whole of your word is truth, and your every righteous judgment endures forever.
content_old: 160 The whole of your word is truth, and your every righteous judgment endures forever.

content: 161 Princes persecute me without cause, but my heart trembles because of your word.
content_old: 161 Princes persecute me without cause, but my heart trembles because of your word.

content: 162 I am rejoicing over your word, like one who finds great spoil.
content_old: 162 I am rejoicing over your word, like one who finds great spoil.

content: 163 I hate and abhor falsehood; I love your law.
content_old: 163 I hate and abhor falsehood; I love your law.

content: 164 I praise you seven times in the day for your righteous ordinances.
content_old: 164 I praise you seven times in the day for your righteous ordinances.

content: 165 Great peace is for those who love your law, and they do not have a cause for stumbling.
content_old: 165 Great peace is for those who love your law, and they do not have a cause for stumbling.

content: 166 I hope for your salvation, O Yahweh, and do your commands.
content_old: 166 I hope for your salvation, O Yahweh, and do your commands.

content: 167 My soul heeds your testimonies, and I love them exceedingly.
content_old: 167 My soul heeds your testimonies, and I love them exceedingly.

content: 168 I heed your precepts and testimonies, because all my ways are before you.
content_old: 168 I heed your precepts and testimonies, because all my ways are before you.

content: 169 Let my cry come before you, O Yahweh; give me understanding according to your word.
content_old: 169 Let my cry come before you, O Yahweh; give me understanding according to your word.

content: 170 Let my plea come before you; Deliver me according to your word.
content_old: 170 Let my plea come before you; Deliver me according to your word.

content: 171 Let my lips pour out praise, because you teach me your statutes.
content_old: 171 Let my lips pour out praise, because you teach me your statutes.

content: 172 Let my tongue sing of your word, because all your commands are right.
content_old: 172 Let my tongue sing of your word, because all your commands are right.

content: 173 Let your hand be my help, because I have chosen your precepts.
content_old: 173 Let your hand be my help, because I have chosen your precepts.

content: 174 I long for your salvation, O Yahweh, and your law is my delight.
content_old: 174 I long for your salvation, O Yahweh, and your law is my delight.

content: 175 Let my soul live that it may praise you, and let your ordinances help me.
content_old: 175 Let my soul live that it may praise you, and let your ordinances help me.

content: A song of ascents.
content_old: A song of ascents.

content: 1 In my distress I called to Yahweh, and he answered me.
content_old: 1 In my distress I called to Yahweh, and he answered me.

content: 2 “Deliver my life, O Yahweh, from lying lips, from a deceitful tongue.”
content_old: 2 “Deliver my life, O Yahweh, from lying lips, from a deceitful tongue.”

content: 3 What shall be given to you, and what more shall be done to you, deceitful tongue?
content_old: 3 What shall be given to you, and what more shall be done to you, deceitful tongue?

content: 4 The sharpened arrows of a warrior, with burning charcoals from broom trees.
content_old: 4 The sharpened arrows of a warrior, with burning charcoals from broom trees.

content: 5 Woe to me, that I sojourn in Meshech, that I dwell among the tents of Kedar.
content_old: 5 Woe to me, that I sojourn in Meshech, that I dwell among the tents of Kedar.

content: 6 Too long my soul has had its dwelling near one who hates peace.
content_old: 6 Too long my soul has had its dwelling near one who hates peace.

content: A song for the ascents.
content_old: A song for the ascents.

content: 1 I lift up my eyes to the mountains; whence will my help come?
content_old: 1 I lift up my eyes to the mountains; whence will my help come?

content: 2 My help is from Yahweh, maker of heaven and earth.
content_old: 2 My help is from Yahweh, maker of heaven and earth.

content: 3 He will not allow your foot to be moved; he who protects you will not slumber.
content_old: 3 He will not allow your foot to be moved; he who protects you will not slumber.

content: 4 Look, he will not slumber and he will not sleep— he who protects Israel.
content_old: 4 Look, he will not slumber and he will not sleep— he who protects Israel.

content: 5 Yahweh is your protector; Yahweh is your shade at your right hand.
content_old: 5 Yahweh is your protector; Yahweh is your shade at your right hand.

content: 6 The sun will not strike you by day, nor the moon by night.
content_old: 6 The sun will not strike you by day, nor the moon by night.

content: 7 Yahweh will protect you from all evil; he will protect your life.
content_old: 7 Yahweh will protect you from all evil; he will protect your life.

content: A song of ascents. Of David.
content_old: A song of ascents. Of David.

content: 1 I rejoiced in those who said to me, “Let us go to the house of Yahweh.”
content_old: 1 I rejoiced in those who said to me, “Let us go to the house of Yahweh.”

content: 2 Our feet are standing within your gates, O Jerusalem—
content_old: 2 Our feet are standing within your gates, O Jerusalem—

content: 3 Jerusalem that is built as a city that is joined together,
content_old: 3 Jerusalem that is built as a city that is joined together,

content: 4 where the tribes go up, the tribes of Yah as a testimony for Israel, to give thanks to the name of Yahweh.
content_old: 4 where the tribes go up, the tribes of Yah as a testimony for Israel, to give thanks to the name of Yahweh.

content: 5 For there the thrones sit for judgment, thrones of David’s house.
content_old: 5 For there the thrones sit for judgment, thrones of David’s house.

content: 6 Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: “May those who love you be at ease.
content_old: 6 Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: “May those who love you be at ease.

content: 7 May peace be within your walls, security within your palaces.”
content_old: 7 May peace be within your walls, security within your palaces.”

content: 8 For the sake of my brothers and my friends, I will say, “Peace be within you.”
content_old: 8 For the sake of my brothers and my friends, I will say, “Peace be within you.”

content: A song of ascents.
content_old: A song of ascents.

content: 1 I lift up my eyes to you, the one enthroned in the heavens.
content_old: 1 I lift up my eyes to you, the one enthroned in the heavens.

content: 2 Behold, as the eyes of servants look to the hand of their master, as the eyes of a maid to the hand of her mistress, so our eyes look to Yahweh our God, until he is gracious to us.
content_old: 2 Behold, as the eyes of servants look to the hand of their master, as the eyes of a maid to the hand of her mistress, so our eyes look to Yahweh our God, until he is gracious to us.

content: 3 Be gracious to us, O Yahweh, be gracious to us, for long enough we have had our fill of contempt.
content_old: 3 Be gracious to us, O Yahweh, be gracious to us, for long enough we have had our fill of contempt.

content: A song of ascents. Of David.
content_old: A song of ascents. Of David.

content: 1 “If it had not been Yahweh who was on our side,” do let Israel say,
content_old: 1 “If it had not been Yahweh who was on our side,” do let Israel say,

content: 2 “If it had not been Yahweh who was on our side, when men rose up against us,
content_old: 2 “If it had not been Yahweh who was on our side, when men rose up against us,

content: 3 then they would have swallowed us alive, when their anger was kindled against us.
content_old: 3 then they would have swallowed us alive, when their anger was kindled against us.

content: 4 Then the waters would have flooded over us, the torrent would have passed over our soul.
content_old: 4 Then the waters would have flooded over us, the torrent would have passed over our soul.

content: 5 Then over our soul would have passed the raging waters.”
content_old: 5 Then over our soul would have passed the raging waters.”

content: 6 Blessed be Yahweh, who has not made us prey for their teeth.
content_old: 6 Blessed be Yahweh, who has not made us prey for their teeth.

content: 7 Our soul has escaped like a bird from the snare of fowlers. The snare is broken, and we have escaped.
content_old: 7 Our soul has escaped like a bird from the snare of fowlers. The snare is broken, and we have escaped.

content: A song of ascents.
content_old: A song of ascents.

content: 1 Those who trust in Yahweh are like Mount Zion, which cannot be moved, but abides forever.
content_old: 1 Those who trust in Yahweh are like Mount Zion, which cannot be moved, but abides forever.

content: 2 As mountains are round about Jerusalem, so Yahweh is round about his people, from now until forever.
content_old: 2 As mountains are round about Jerusalem, so Yahweh is round about his people, from now until forever.

content: 3 For the scepter of wickedness shall not rest on the land of the righteous, lest the righteous stretch out their hands to do wickedness.
content_old: 3 For the scepter of wickedness shall not rest on the land of the righteous, lest the righteous stretch out their hands to do wickedness.

content: 4 Do good, O Yahweh, to the good, and to those upright in their hearts.
content_old: 4 Do good, O Yahweh, to the good, and to those upright in their hearts.

content: A song of ascents.
content_old: A song of ascents.

content: 1 When Yahweh restored the fortunes of Zion, we were like dreamers.
content_old: 1 When Yahweh restored the fortunes of Zion, we were like dreamers.

content: 2 Then our mouth was filled with laughter, and our tongue with rejoicing. Then they said among the nations, “Yahweh has done great things for these people.”
content_old: 2 Then our mouth was filled with laughter, and our tongue with rejoicing. Then they said among the nations, “Yahweh has done great things for these people.”

content: 3 Yahweh has done great things for us; we are glad.
content_old: 3 Yahweh has done great things for us; we are glad.

content: 4 Restore, O Yahweh, our fortunes like the streams in the Negeb.
content_old: 4 Restore, O Yahweh, our fortunes like the streams in the Negeb.

content: 5 Those who sow with tears shall reap with rejoicing.
content_old: 5 Those who sow with tears shall reap with rejoicing.

content: A song of ascents. Of Solomon.
content_old: A song of ascents. Of Solomon.

content: 1 Unless Yahweh builds a house, its builders labor at it in vain. Unless Yahweh guards a city, a guard watches in vain.
content_old: 1 Unless Yahweh builds a house, its builders labor at it in vain. Unless Yahweh guards a city, a guard watches in vain.

content: 2 It is in vain for you who rise early and sit late, eating the bread of anxious toil, when thus he provides for his beloved in his sleep.
content_old: 2 It is in vain for you who rise early and sit late, eating the bread of anxious toil, when thus he provides for his beloved in his sleep.

content: 3 Look, children are the heritage of Yahweh; the fruit of the womb is a reward.
content_old: 3 Look, children are the heritage of Yahweh; the fruit of the womb is a reward.

content: 4 Like arrows in the hand of a warrior, so are the children of one’s youth.
content_old: 4 Like arrows in the hand of a warrior, so are the children of one’s youth.

content: A song of ascents.
content_old: A song of ascents.

content: 1 Blessed is everyone who fears Yahweh, who walks in his ways.
