content_old: 1 Blessed is everyone who fears Yahweh, who walks in his ways.

content: 2 You will indeed eat of the labor of your hands; you will be happy and it will be well with you.
content_old: 2 You will indeed eat of the labor of your hands; you will be happy and it will be well with you.

content: 3 Your wife will be like a fruitful vine within your house. Your children will be like olive shoots about your table.
content_old: 3 Your wife will be like a fruitful vine within your house. Your children will be like olive shoots about your table.

content: 4 Look, for thus shall a man be blessed who fears Yahweh.
content_old: 4 Look, for thus shall a man be blessed who fears Yahweh.

content: 5 May Yahweh bless you from Zion, that you may see the good of Jerusalem all the days of your life,
content_old: 5 May Yahweh bless you from Zion, that you may see the good of Jerusalem all the days of your life,

content: A song of ascents.
content_old: A song of ascents.

content: 1 “Too often they have attacked me from my youth.” Let Israel say,
content_old: 1 “Too often they have attacked me from my youth.” Let Israel say,

content: 2 “Too often they have attacked me from my youth, yet they have not prevailed against me.
content_old: 2 “Too often they have attacked me from my youth, yet they have not prevailed against me.

content: 3 On my back plowmen have plowed. They have made their furrows long.”
content_old: 3 On my back plowmen have plowed. They have made their furrows long.”

content: 4 Yahweh is righteous. He has cut the ropes of the wicked.
content_old: 4 Yahweh is righteous. He has cut the ropes of the wicked.

content: 5 Let all be put to shame and repulsed who hate Zion.
content_old: 5 Let all be put to shame and repulsed who hate Zion.

content: 6 Let them be like grass on the housetops, that withers before it grows up,
content_old: 6 Let them be like grass on the housetops, that withers before it grows up,

content: 7 with which a reaper cannot fill his hand, nor the binder of sheaves his arms,
content_old: 7 with which a reaper cannot fill his hand, nor the binder of sheaves his arms,

content: A song of ascents.
content_old: A song of ascents.

content: 1 Out of the depths I call to you, O Yahweh.
content_old: 1 Out of the depths I call to you, O Yahweh.

content: 2 “O Lord, hear my voice. Let your ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.
content_old: 2 “O Lord, hear my voice. Let your ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.

content: 3 If you, O Yah, should keep track of iniquities, O Lord, who could stand?
content_old: 3 If you, O Yah, should keep track of iniquities, O Lord, who could stand?

content: 4 But with you is forgiveness, so that you may be feared.”
content_old: 4 But with you is forgiveness, so that you may be feared.”

content: 5 I await Yahweh; my soul awaits, and I wait for his word.
content_old: 5 I await Yahweh; my soul awaits, and I wait for his word.

content: 6 My soul waits for the Lord more than watchmen for the morning. Yes, more than watchmen for the morning.
content_old: 6 My soul waits for the Lord more than watchmen for the morning. Yes, more than watchmen for the morning.

content: 7 O Israel, wait for Yahweh. For with Yahweh there is loyal love, and with him there is abundant redemption.
content_old: 7 O Israel, wait for Yahweh. For with Yahweh there is loyal love, and with him there is abundant redemption.

content: A song of ascents. Of David.
content_old: A song of ascents. Of David.

content: 1 O Yahweh, my heart is not haughty nor my eyes arrogant. And I do not concern myself with things too great and difficult for me.
content_old: 1 O Yahweh, my heart is not haughty nor my eyes arrogant. And I do not concern myself with things too great and difficult for me.

content: 2 Rather I have soothed and quieted my soul, like a weaned child with its mother, like the weaned child is my soul with me.
content_old: 2 Rather I have soothed and quieted my soul, like a weaned child with its mother, like the weaned child is my soul with me.

content: A song of ascents.
content_old: A song of ascents.

content: 1 O Yahweh, remember with regard to David all his affliction.
content_old: 1 O Yahweh, remember with regard to David all his affliction.

content: 2 How he swore to Yahweh, he vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob:
content_old: 2 How he swore to Yahweh, he vowed to the Mighty One of Jacob:

content: 3 “I will not enter into the tent of my house, I will not go up to the couch of my bed,
content_old: 3 “I will not enter into the tent of my house, I will not go up to the couch of my bed,

content: 4 I will give no sleep to my eyes, no slumber to my eyelids,
content_old: 4 I will give no sleep to my eyes, no slumber to my eyelids,

content: 5 until I find a place for Yahweh, a dwelling place for the Mighty One of Jacob.”
content_old: 5 until I find a place for Yahweh, a dwelling place for the Mighty One of Jacob.”

content: 6 Look, we heard of it in Ephrathah; we found her in the fields of Jaar.
content_old: 6 Look, we heard of it in Ephrathah; we found her in the fields of Jaar.

content: 7 Let us go to his dwelling places; Let us worship at his footstool.
content_old: 7 Let us go to his dwelling places; Let us worship at his footstool.

content: 8 Arise, O Yahweh, to your resting place, you and your mighty ark.
content_old: 8 Arise, O Yahweh, to your resting place, you and your mighty ark.

content: 9 Let your priests clothe themselves with righteousness, and let your faithful sing for joy.
content_old: 9 Let your priests clothe themselves with righteousness, and let your faithful sing for joy.

content: 10 For the sake of your servant David, do not turn away the face of your anointed one.
content_old: 10 For the sake of your servant David, do not turn away the face of your anointed one.

content: 11 Yahweh swore in truth to David; he will not turn back from it. “One from the fruit of your body I will set on your throne.
content_old: 11 Yahweh swore in truth to David; he will not turn back from it. “One from the fruit of your body I will set on your throne.

content: 12 If your sons will heed my covenant and my testimonies that I will teach them, their sons also forever will sit on your throne.”
content_old: 12 If your sons will heed my covenant and my testimonies that I will teach them, their sons also forever will sit on your throne.”

content: 13 For Yahweh has chosen Zion; he has desired it for his habitation.
content_old: 13 For Yahweh has chosen Zion; he has desired it for his habitation.

content: 14 “This is my resting place forever; here I will dwell, for I have desired it.
content_old: 14 “This is my resting place forever; here I will dwell, for I have desired it.

content: 15 I will bless its provisions abundantly; I will satisfy its poor with bread.
content_old: 15 I will bless its provisions abundantly; I will satisfy its poor with bread.

content: 16 I will also clothe its priests with salvation, and its faithful will shout exuberantly for joy.
content_old: 16 I will also clothe its priests with salvation, and its faithful will shout exuberantly for joy.

content: 17 There I will cause a horn to grow for David; I will set a lamp for my anointed one.
content_old: 17 There I will cause a horn to grow for David; I will set a lamp for my anointed one.

content: A song of ascents. Of David.
content_old: A song of ascents. Of David.

content: 1 Look, how good and how pleasant it is when brothers dwell together in unity.
content_old: 1 Look, how good and how pleasant it is when brothers dwell together in unity.

content: 2 It is like the fragrant oil upon the head, running down upon the beard, the beard of Aaron, that runs down upon the edges of his robes.
content_old: 2 It is like the fragrant oil upon the head, running down upon the beard, the beard of Aaron, that runs down upon the edges of his robes.

content: A song of ascents.
content_old: A song of ascents.

content: 1 Look, bless Yahweh, all you the servants of Yahweh, who serve in the house of Yahweh by night.
content_old: 1 Look, bless Yahweh, all you the servants of Yahweh, who serve in the house of Yahweh by night.

content: 2 Lift up your hands in the sanctuary and bless Yahweh.
content_old: 2 Lift up your hands in the sanctuary and bless Yahweh.

content: 1 Praise Yah! Praise the name of Yahweh. Praise him, O servants of Yahweh,
content_old: 1 Praise Yah! Praise the name of Yahweh. Praise him, O servants of Yahweh,

content: 2 who stand in the house of Yahweh, in the courts of the house of our God.
content_old: 2 who stand in the house of Yahweh, in the courts of the house of our God.

content: 3 Praise Yah, for Yahweh is good. Sing praises concerning his name, for it is pleasant.
content_old: 3 Praise Yah, for Yahweh is good. Sing praises concerning his name, for it is pleasant.

content: 4 For Yah has chosen Jacob for himself, Israel as his special possession.
content_old: 4 For Yah has chosen Jacob for himself, Israel as his special possession.

content: 5 For I know that Yahweh is great, and our Lord is greater than all gods.
content_old: 5 For I know that Yahweh is great, and our Lord is greater than all gods.

content: 6 All that Yahweh desires, he does, in heaven and on earth, in the seas and all the depths.
content_old: 6 All that Yahweh desires, he does, in heaven and on earth, in the seas and all the depths.

content: 7 He causes clouds to rise from the edge of the earth; he makes lightnings for the rain; he brings out the wind from his storehouses.
content_old: 7 He causes clouds to rise from the edge of the earth; he makes lightnings for the rain; he brings out the wind from his storehouses.

content: 8 Who struck the firstborn of Egypt, both of humans and animals.
content_old: 8 Who struck the firstborn of Egypt, both of humans and animals.

content: 9 He sent signs and wonders into your midst, O Egypt, against Pharaoh and all his servants.
content_old: 9 He sent signs and wonders into your midst, O Egypt, against Pharaoh and all his servants.

content: 10 Who struck many nations and killed mighty kings—
content_old: 10 Who struck many nations and killed mighty kings—

content: 11 Sihon the king of the Amorites, and Og the king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan—
content_old: 11 Sihon the king of the Amorites, and Og the king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan—

content: 12 and he gave their land as an inheritance, an inheritance for his people Israel.
content_old: 12 and he gave their land as an inheritance, an inheritance for his people Israel.

content: 13 O Yahweh, your name endures forever, O Yahweh, your renown throughout all generations,
content_old: 13 O Yahweh, your name endures forever, O Yahweh, your renown throughout all generations,

content: 14 for Yahweh will plead the cause of his people and will have compassion on his servants.
content_old: 14 for Yahweh will plead the cause of his people and will have compassion on his servants.

content: 15 The idols of the nations are silver and gold, the work of the hands of humankind.
content_old: 15 The idols of the nations are silver and gold, the work of the hands of humankind.

content: 16 They have mouths, but cannot speak; they have eyes, but cannot see;
content_old: 16 They have mouths, but cannot speak; they have eyes, but cannot see;

content: 17 they have ears, but cannot hear; there is not even breath in their mouths.
content_old: 17 they have ears, but cannot hear; there is not even breath in their mouths.

content: 18 Those who make them become like them, as does everyone who trusts in them.
content_old: 18 Those who make them become like them, as does everyone who trusts in them.

content: 19 O house of Israel, bless Yahweh. O house of Aaron, bless Yahweh.
content_old: 19 O house of Israel, bless Yahweh. O house of Aaron, bless Yahweh.

content: 20 O house of Levi, bless Yahweh. You who fear Yahweh, bless Yahweh.
content_old: 20 O house of Levi, bless Yahweh. You who fear Yahweh, bless Yahweh.

content: 1 Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 1 Give thanks to Yahweh, for he is good, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 2 Give thanks to the God of gods, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 2 Give thanks to the God of gods, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 3 Give thanks to the Lord of lords, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 3 Give thanks to the Lord of lords, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 4 To him who alone does great wonders, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 4 To him who alone does great wonders, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 5 To him who made the heavens with skill, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 5 To him who made the heavens with skill, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 6 To him who spread out the earth above the waters, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 6 To him who spread out the earth above the waters, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 7 To him who made the great lights, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 7 To him who made the great lights, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 8 The sun to rule the day, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 8 The sun to rule the day, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 9 The moon and stars to rule the night, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 9 The moon and stars to rule the night, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 10 To him who struck Egypt through their firstborn, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 10 To him who struck Egypt through their firstborn, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 11 And he brought Israel out from among them, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 11 And he brought Israel out from among them, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 12 With a strong hand and an outstretched arm, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 12 With a strong hand and an outstretched arm, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 13 To him who divided the Red Sea in two, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 13 To him who divided the Red Sea in two, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 14 And he let Israel cross over through the midst of it, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 14 And he let Israel cross over through the midst of it, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 15 But he tossed Pharaoh and his army into the Red Sea, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 15 But he tossed Pharaoh and his army into the Red Sea, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 16 To him who led his people through the wilderness, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 16 To him who led his people through the wilderness, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 17 To him who struck great kings, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 17 To him who struck great kings, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 18 And he killed mighty kings, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 18 And he killed mighty kings, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 19 Sihon the king of the Amorites, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 19 Sihon the king of the Amorites, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 20 And Og the king of Bashan, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 20 And Og the king of Bashan, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 21 And he gave their land as an inheritance, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 21 And he gave their land as an inheritance, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 22 An inheritance to Israel his servant, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 22 An inheritance to Israel his servant, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 23 Who remembered us in our low estate, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 23 Who remembered us in our low estate, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 24 And he rescued us from our enemies, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 24 And he rescued us from our enemies, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 25 The one who gives food to all flesh, for his loyal love endures forever.
content_old: 25 The one who gives food to all flesh, for his loyal love endures forever.

content: 1 By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat, yes, we wept, when we remembered Zion.
content_old: 1 By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat, yes, we wept, when we remembered Zion.

content: 2 On the willows in her midst, we hung up our lyres.
content_old: 2 On the willows in her midst, we hung up our lyres.

content: 3 For there our captors asked of us words of a song, and our tormentors asked of us jubilation, “Sing for us from a song of Zion.”
content_old: 3 For there our captors asked of us words of a song, and our tormentors asked of us jubilation, “Sing for us from a song of Zion.”

content: 4 How could we sing the song of Yahweh in a foreign land?
content_old: 4 How could we sing the song of Yahweh in a foreign land?

content: 5 If I forget you, O Jerusalem, let my right hand forget.
content_old: 5 If I forget you, O Jerusalem, let my right hand forget.

content: 6 Let my tongue cling to the roof of my mouth, if I do not remember you, if do not I exalt Jerusalem above my highest joy.
content_old: 6 Let my tongue cling to the roof of my mouth, if I do not remember you, if do not I exalt Jerusalem above my highest joy.

content: 7 Remember, O Yahweh, against the sons of Edom the day of Jerusalem, the ones who said, “Lay it bare! Lay it bare to its foundation!”
content_old: 7 Remember, O Yahweh, against the sons of Edom the day of Jerusalem, the ones who said, “Lay it bare! Lay it bare to its foundation!”

content: 8 O daughter of Babylon, about to be devastated, happy shall be he who pays back to you what you paid out to us.
content_old: 8 O daughter of Babylon, about to be devastated, happy shall be he who pays back to you what you paid out to us.

content: Of David.
content_old: Of David.

content: 1 I give you thanks with my whole heart; before the gods I sing your praise.
content_old: 1 I give you thanks with my whole heart; before the gods I sing your praise.

content: 2 I bow down toward your holy temple and give thanks to your name, because of your loyal love and faithfulness, for you have magnified your word according to all your name.
content_old: 2 I bow down toward your holy temple and give thanks to your name, because of your loyal love and faithfulness, for you have magnified your word according to all your name.

content: 3 When I called and you answered me, you emboldened me in my soul with strength.
content_old: 3 When I called and you answered me, you emboldened me in my soul with strength.

content: 4 All the kings of the earth will praise you, O Yahweh, when they have heard the words of your mouth,
content_old: 4 All the kings of the earth will praise you, O Yahweh, when they have heard the words of your mouth,

content: 5 and they will sing of the ways of Yahweh, because Yahweh’s glory is great.
content_old: 5 and they will sing of the ways of Yahweh, because Yahweh’s glory is great.

content: 6 Though Yahweh is high, yet he sees the lowly, but the proud he perceives at a distance.
content_old: 6 Though Yahweh is high, yet he sees the lowly, but the proud he perceives at a distance.

content: 7 Though I walk in the midst of trouble, you preserve me alive. You stretch out your hand against the anger of my enemies, and you save me with your right hand.
content_old: 7 Though I walk in the midst of trouble, you preserve me alive. You stretch out your hand against the anger of my enemies, and you save me with your right hand.

content: For the music director. Of David. A psalm.
content_old: For the music director. Of David. A psalm.

content: 1 O Yahweh, you have searched me, and you know me.
content_old: 1 O Yahweh, you have searched me, and you know me.

content: 2 You know my sitting down and my rising up. You understand my thought from afar.
content_old: 2 You know my sitting down and my rising up. You understand my thought from afar.

content: 3 You search out my wandering and my lying down, and are acquainted with all my ways.
content_old: 3 You search out my wandering and my lying down, and are acquainted with all my ways.

content: 4 For there is not a word yet on my tongue, but behold, O Yahweh, you know it completely.
content_old: 4 For there is not a word yet on my tongue, but behold, O Yahweh, you know it completely.

content: 5 You barricade me behind and in front, and set your hand upon me.
content_old: 5 You barricade me behind and in front, and set your hand upon me.

content: 6 Such knowledge is too wonderful for me. It is set high; I cannot prevail against it.
content_old: 6 Such knowledge is too wonderful for me. It is set high; I cannot prevail against it.

content: 7 Where can I go from your Spirit, or where can I flee from your presence?
content_old: 7 Where can I go from your Spirit, or where can I flee from your presence?

content: 8 If I ascend to heaven, there you are, and if I make my bed in Sheol, look! There you are.
content_old: 8 If I ascend to heaven, there you are, and if I make my bed in Sheol, look! There you are.

content: 9 If I lift up the wings of the dawn, and I alight on the far side of the sea,
content_old: 9 If I lift up the wings of the dawn, and I alight on the far side of the sea,

content: 10 even there your hand would lead me, and your right hand would hold me fast.
content_old: 10 even there your hand would lead me, and your right hand would hold me fast.

content: 11 And if I should say, “Surely darkness will cover me, and the light around me will be as night,”
content_old: 11 And if I should say, “Surely darkness will cover me, and the light around me will be as night,”

content: 12 even the darkness is not too dark for you, and the night shines as the day— the darkness and the light are alike for you.
content_old: 12 even the darkness is not too dark for you, and the night shines as the day— the darkness and the light are alike for you.

content: 13 Indeed you created my inward parts; you wove me in my mother’s womb.
content_old: 13 Indeed you created my inward parts; you wove me in my mother’s womb.

content: 14 I praise you, because I am fearfully and wonderfully made. Wonderful are your works, and my soul knows it well.
content_old: 14 I praise you, because I am fearfully and wonderfully made. Wonderful are your works, and my soul knows it well.

content: 15 My frame was not hidden from you, when I was created secretly, and intricately woven in the depths of the earth.
content_old: 15 My frame was not hidden from you, when I was created secretly, and intricately woven in the depths of the earth.

content: 16 Your eyes saw my embryo, and in your book they all were written— days fashioned for me when there was not one of them.
content_old: 16 Your eyes saw my embryo, and in your book they all were written— days fashioned for me when there was not one of them.

content: 17 And to me, how precious are your thoughts, O God; how vast is their sum.
content_old: 17 And to me, how precious are your thoughts, O God; how vast is their sum.

content: 18 If I should count them, they would outnumber the sand. I awaken, and I am still with you.
content_old: 18 If I should count them, they would outnumber the sand. I awaken, and I am still with you.

content: 19 If only you would kill the wicked, O God— so get away from me, you bloodthirsty men—
content_old: 19 If only you would kill the wicked, O God— so get away from me, you bloodthirsty men—

content: 20 who speak against you deceitfully. Your enemies take your name in vain.
content_old: 20 who speak against you deceitfully. Your enemies take your name in vain.

content: 21 Do I not hate those who hate you, O Yahweh? And do I not loathe those who rise up against you?
content_old: 21 Do I not hate those who hate you, O Yahweh? And do I not loathe those who rise up against you?

content: 22 I hate them with a complete hatred; they have become my enemies.
content_old: 22 I hate them with a complete hatred; they have become my enemies.

content: 23 Search me, O God, and know my heart; test me and know my anxious thoughts.
content_old: 23 Search me, O God, and know my heart; test me and know my anxious thoughts.

content: For the music director. A psalm of David.
content_old: For the music director. A psalm of David.

content: 1 Rescue me, O Yahweh, from evil men. Preserve me from violent men,
content_old: 1 Rescue me, O Yahweh, from evil men. Preserve me from violent men,

content: 2 who plan evil things in their heart. They stir up wars continually.
content_old: 2 who plan evil things in their heart. They stir up wars continually.

content: 3 They sharpen their tongue as sharp as a snake’s; the venom of a viper is under their lips. Selah
content_old: 3 They sharpen their tongue as sharp as a snake’s; the venom of a viper is under their lips. Selah

content: 4 Protect me, O Yahweh, from the hands of the wicked. Preserve me from violent men, who have planned to make me stumble.
content_old: 4 Protect me, O Yahweh, from the hands of the wicked. Preserve me from violent men, who have planned to make me stumble.

content: 5 The proud have hidden a trap for me, and cords. They have spread out a net along the side of the path. They have set snares for me. Selah
content_old: 5 The proud have hidden a trap for me, and cords. They have spread out a net along the side of the path. They have set snares for me. Selah

content: 6 I say to Yahweh, “You are my God.” Listen, O Yahweh, to the voice of my supplications.
content_old: 6 I say to Yahweh, “You are my God.” Listen, O Yahweh, to the voice of my supplications.

content: 7 O Yahweh, my Lord, the strength of my salvation, you have covered my head in the day of battle.
content_old: 7 O Yahweh, my Lord, the strength of my salvation, you have covered my head in the day of battle.

content: 8 Do not grant, O Yahweh, the desires of the wicked. Do not allow them to attain their plan, lest they be exalted. Selah
content_old: 8 Do not grant, O Yahweh, the desires of the wicked. Do not allow them to attain their plan, lest they be exalted. Selah

content: 9 With respect to the head of those who surround me, may the harm of their lips cover them.
content_old: 9 With respect to the head of those who surround me, may the harm of their lips cover them.

content: 10 Let burning coals fall on them; let them be dropped into the fire, into bottomless pits from which they cannot rise.
content_old: 10 Let burning coals fall on them; let them be dropped into the fire, into bottomless pits from which they cannot rise.

content: 11 Do not let a slanderer be established in the land; as for the man of violence, let evil hunt him quickly.
content_old: 11 Do not let a slanderer be established in the land; as for the man of violence, let evil hunt him quickly.

content: 12 I know that Yahweh will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and justice for the needy.
content_old: 12 I know that Yahweh will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and justice for the needy.

content: A psalm of David.
content_old: A psalm of David.

content: 1 I call on you, O Yahweh; hasten to me. Listen to my voice when I call to you.
content_old: 1 I call on you, O Yahweh; hasten to me. Listen to my voice when I call to you.

content: 2 Let my prayer be set before you as incense, the lifting up of my palms as the evening offering.
content_old: 2 Let my prayer be set before you as incense, the lifting up of my palms as the evening offering.

content: 3 Set a guard, O Yahweh, over my mouth; keep watch over the door of my lips.
content_old: 3 Set a guard, O Yahweh, over my mouth; keep watch over the door of my lips.

content: 4 Do not incline my heart to any evil thing, to practice wicked deeds with men who do iniquity; and do not let me eat of their delicacies.
content_old: 4 Do not incline my heart to any evil thing, to practice wicked deeds with men who do iniquity; and do not let me eat of their delicacies.

content: 5 Let a righteous one strike me in kindness, and let him chasten me. It is oil for my head; let not my head refuse. For still my prayer is against their evil deeds.
content_old: 5 Let a righteous one strike me in kindness, and let him chasten me. It is oil for my head; let not my head refuse. For still my prayer is against their evil deeds.

content: 6 When their judges are thrown down the sides of a cliff, then they will understand that my words were pleasant.
content_old: 6 When their judges are thrown down the sides of a cliff, then they will understand that my words were pleasant.

content: 7 As when one plows and breaks up the earth, so our bones are scattered at the mouth of Sheol.
content_old: 7 As when one plows and breaks up the earth, so our bones are scattered at the mouth of Sheol.

content: 8 But my eyes are toward you, O Yahweh, my Lord; I have taken refuge in you. Do not lay bare my soul.
content_old: 8 But my eyes are toward you, O Yahweh, my Lord; I have taken refuge in you. Do not lay bare my soul.

content: 9 Protect me from the grasp of the trap they have laid for me, and from the snares of evildoers.
content_old: 9 Protect me from the grasp of the trap they have laid for me, and from the snares of evildoers.

content: A maskil of David. When he was in the cave. A prayer.
content_old: A maskil of David. When he was in the cave. A prayer.

content: 1 I cry out with my voice to Yahweh; I implore favor with my voice to Yahweh.
content_old: 1 I cry out with my voice to Yahweh; I implore favor with my voice to Yahweh.

content: 2 I pour out my complaint before him; I declare my trouble before him.
content_old: 2 I pour out my complaint before him; I declare my trouble before him.

content: 3 When my spirit faints within me, you know my way. On the path where I walk, they have hidden a trap for me;
content_old: 3 When my spirit faints within me, you know my way. On the path where I walk, they have hidden a trap for me;

content: 4 look to my right and see. There is no one looking out for me; there is no escape for me; no one cares for my soul.
content_old: 4 look to my right and see. There is no one looking out for me; there is no escape for me; no one cares for my soul.

content: 5 I cry out to you, O Yahweh. I say, “You are my refuge, my portion in the land of the living.”
content_old: 5 I cry out to you, O Yahweh. I say, “You are my refuge, my portion in the land of the living.”

content: 6 Attend to my cry, for I am brought very low. Deliver me from my pursuers, for they are stronger than I.
content_old: 6 Attend to my cry, for I am brought very low. Deliver me from my pursuers, for they are stronger than I.

content: A psalm of David.
content_old: A psalm of David.

content: 1 O Yahweh, hear my prayer; listen to my supplications. In your faithfulness answer me, and in your righteousness.
content_old: 1 O Yahweh, hear my prayer; listen to my supplications. In your faithfulness answer me, and in your righteousness.

content: 2 And do not enter into judgment with your servant, because no one alive is righteous before you.
content_old: 2 And do not enter into judgment with your servant, because no one alive is righteous before you.

content: 3 For the enemy has pursued my soul; he has crushed my life to the ground. He has made me dwell in dark places like those long dead.
content_old: 3 For the enemy has pursued my soul; he has crushed my life to the ground. He has made me dwell in dark places like those long dead.

content: 4 And so my spirit grows faint within me; my heart within me is desolate.
content_old: 4 And so my spirit grows faint within me; my heart within me is desolate.

content: 5 I remember the days of long ago; I meditate on all your doings. I muse on the labor of your hands.
content_old: 5 I remember the days of long ago; I meditate on all your doings. I muse on the labor of your hands.

content: 6 I stretch out my hands to you; my soul longs for you like a dry land. Selah
content_old: 6 I stretch out my hands to you; my soul longs for you like a dry land. Selah

content: 7 Quickly answer me, O Yahweh; my spirit fails. Do not hide your face from me, or I will become like those descending to the pit.
content_old: 7 Quickly answer me, O Yahweh; my spirit fails. Do not hide your face from me, or I will become like those descending to the pit.

content: 8 Cause me to hear your loyal love in the morning, for I trust you. Cause me to know the way that I should go, for I lift up my soul to you.
content_old: 8 Cause me to hear your loyal love in the morning, for I trust you. Cause me to know the way that I should go, for I lift up my soul to you.

content: 9 Deliver me from my enemies, O Yahweh. I take refuge in you.
content_old: 9 Deliver me from my enemies, O Yahweh. I take refuge in you.

content: 10 Teach me to do your will, for you are my God; your Spirit is good. Lead me onto level ground.
content_old: 10 Teach me to do your will, for you are my God; your Spirit is good. Lead me onto level ground.

content: 11 For your name’s sake, O Yahweh, preserve my life; in your righteousness bring me out of trouble.
content_old: 11 For your name’s sake, O Yahweh, preserve my life; in your righteousness bring me out of trouble.

content: Of David.
content_old: Of David.

content: 1 Blessed be Yahweh, my rock, the one who trains my hands for battle, my fingers for war—
content_old: 1 Blessed be Yahweh, my rock, the one who trains my hands for battle, my fingers for war—

content: 2 my loyal love and my fortress, my stronghold and my deliverer, my shield, and one in whom I take refuge, the one who subdues peoples under me.
content_old: 2 my loyal love and my fortress, my stronghold and my deliverer, my shield, and one in whom I take refuge, the one who subdues peoples under me.

content: 3 O Yahweh, what is humankind that you take knowledge of him, or the son of man that you take thought of him?
content_old: 3 O Yahweh, what is humankind that you take knowledge of him, or the son of man that you take thought of him?

content: 4 Humankind is like a breath, his days like a passing shadow.
content_old: 4 Humankind is like a breath, his days like a passing shadow.

content: 5 O Yahweh, bow the heavens and come down; touch the mountains so that they smoke.
content_old: 5 O Yahweh, bow the heavens and come down; touch the mountains so that they smoke.

content: 6 Flash forth lightning and scatter them; dispatch your arrows and rout them.
content_old: 6 Flash forth lightning and scatter them; dispatch your arrows and rout them.

content: 7 Stretch out your hands from on high; Rescue me and deliver me from many waters, from the hand of foreigners,
content_old: 7 Stretch out your hands from on high; Rescue me and deliver me from many waters, from the hand of foreigners,

content: 8 whose mouth speaks falsely, and their right hand is a false right hand.
content_old: 8 whose mouth speaks falsely, and their right hand is a false right hand.

content: 9 O God, I will sing a new song to you. With a lyre of ten strings I will sing praise to you,
content_old: 9 O God, I will sing a new song to you. With a lyre of ten strings I will sing praise to you,

content: 10 who gives victory to kings, who rescues David his servant from the evil sword.
content_old: 10 who gives victory to kings, who rescues David his servant from the evil sword.

content: 11 Rescue me and deliver me from the hand of foreigners, whose mouth speaks falsely, and whose right hand is a false right hand,
content_old: 11 Rescue me and deliver me from the hand of foreigners, whose mouth speaks falsely, and whose right hand is a false right hand,

content: 12 that our sons may be like plants, full grown in their youth, our daughters like corner pillars, carved in the style of a palace,
content_old: 12 that our sons may be like plants, full grown in their youth, our daughters like corner pillars, carved in the style of a palace,

content: 13 that our granaries may be full, providing produce of all kinds, that our sheep may produce by the thousands, by the tens of thousands in our open fields,
content_old: 13 that our granaries may be full, providing produce of all kinds, that our sheep may produce by the thousands, by the tens of thousands in our open fields,

content: 14 that our cattle may be pregnant; that there be no breach in our walls, and no going out in exile, and no outcry in our plazas.
content_old: 14 that our cattle may be pregnant; that there be no breach in our walls, and no going out in exile, and no outcry in our plazas.

content: A praise of David.
content_old: A praise of David.

content: 1 I will exalt you, my God, O king, and I will bless your name forever and ever.
content_old: 1 I will exalt you, my God, O king, and I will bless your name forever and ever.

content: 2 Every day I will bless you and praise your name forever and ever.
content_old: 2 Every day I will bless you and praise your name forever and ever.

content: 3 Great is Yahweh, and very worthy of praise, and his greatness is unsearchable.
content_old: 3 Great is Yahweh, and very worthy of praise, and his greatness is unsearchable.

content: 4 One generation will laud your works to another, and will declare your mighty deeds.
content_old: 4 One generation will laud your works to another, and will declare your mighty deeds.

content: 5 On the splendor of the glory of your majesty, and on your wonderful deeds, I will meditate.
content_old: 5 On the splendor of the glory of your majesty, and on your wonderful deeds, I will meditate.

content: 6 And they will speak of the power of your awesome deeds, and I will tell of your greatness.
content_old: 6 And they will speak of the power of your awesome deeds, and I will tell of your greatness.

content: 7 They will utter the renown of your abundant goodness, and they will proclaim with joy your righteousness.
content_old: 7 They will utter the renown of your abundant goodness, and they will proclaim with joy your righteousness.

content: 8 Yahweh is gracious and compassionate, slow to anger and great in loyal love.
content_old: 8 Yahweh is gracious and compassionate, slow to anger and great in loyal love.

content: 9 Yahweh is good to all, and his mercies are over all his works.
content_old: 9 Yahweh is good to all, and his mercies are over all his works.

content: 10 All your works will praise you, O Yahweh, and your faithful ones will bless you.
content_old: 10 All your works will praise you, O Yahweh, and your faithful ones will bless you.

content: 11 They will speak of the glory of your kingdom, and talk of your power,
content_old: 11 They will speak of the glory of your kingdom, and talk of your power,

content: 12 to make known to the children of humankind his mighty deeds, and the glory of the majesty of his kingdom.
content_old: 12 to make known to the children of humankind his mighty deeds, and the glory of the majesty of his kingdom.

content: 13 Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and your dominion endures throughout all generations.
content_old: 13 Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and your dominion endures throughout all generations.

content: 14 Yahweh upholds all who are falling, and raises up all who are bowed down.
content_old: 14 Yahweh upholds all who are falling, and raises up all who are bowed down.

content: 15 The eyes of all look hopefully to you, and you give them their food in due time,
content_old: 15 The eyes of all look hopefully to you, and you give them their food in due time,

content: 16 opening your hand, and satisfying the desire of every living creature.
content_old: 16 opening your hand, and satisfying the desire of every living creature.

content: 17 Yahweh is righteous in all his ways, and loyal in all his works.
content_old: 17 Yahweh is righteous in all his ways, and loyal in all his works.

content: 18 Yahweh is near to all who call on him, to all who call on him in truth.
content_old: 18 Yahweh is near to all who call on him, to all who call on him in truth.

content: 19 He fulfills the desire of those who fear him; he also hears their cry for help, and saves them.
content_old: 19 He fulfills the desire of those who fear him; he also hears their cry for help, and saves them.

content: 20 Yahweh protects all those who love him, but all the wicked he will exterminate.
content_old: 20 Yahweh protects all those who love him, but all the wicked he will exterminate.

content: 1 Praise Yah. Praise Yahweh, O my soul.
content_old: 1 Praise Yah. Praise Yahweh, O my soul.

content: 2 I will praise Yahweh while I live; I will sing praises to my God while I am still alive.
content_old: 2 I will praise Yahweh while I live; I will sing praises to my God while I am still alive.

content: 3 Do not place trust in princes, in a son of humankind with whom there is no deliverance.
content_old: 3 Do not place trust in princes, in a son of humankind with whom there is no deliverance.

content: 4 His breath departs; he returns to his plot; on that day his plans perish.
content_old: 4 His breath departs; he returns to his plot; on that day his plans perish.

content: 5 Blessed is the one whose help is the God of Jacob, whose hope is on Yahweh as his God,
content_old: 5 Blessed is the one whose help is the God of Jacob, whose hope is on Yahweh as his God,

content: 6 who made heaven and earth, the sea and all that is in them, the one who keeps faith forever,
content_old: 6 who made heaven and earth, the sea and all that is in them, the one who keeps faith forever,

content: 7 who executes justice for the oppressed, who gives food for the hungry. Yahweh sets prisoners free;
content_old: 7 who executes justice for the oppressed, who gives food for the hungry. Yahweh sets prisoners free;

content: 8 Yahweh opens the eyes of the blind; Yahweh raises up those bowed down; Yahweh loves the righteous;
content_old: 8 Yahweh opens the eyes of the blind; Yahweh raises up those bowed down; Yahweh loves the righteous;

content: 9 Yahweh protects the strangers. He helps up the orphan and the widow, but the way of the wicked he thwarts.
content_old: 9 Yahweh protects the strangers. He helps up the orphan and the widow, but the way of the wicked he thwarts.

content: 1 Praise Yah. For it is good to sing praises to our God; for it is pleasant; praise is fitting.
content_old: 1 Praise Yah. For it is good to sing praises to our God; for it is pleasant; praise is fitting.

content: 2 Yahweh is building Jerusalem; he gathers the scattered ones of Israel.
content_old: 2 Yahweh is building Jerusalem; he gathers the scattered ones of Israel.

content: 3 He is the one who heals the brokenhearted, and binds up their wounds.
content_old: 3 He is the one who heals the brokenhearted, and binds up their wounds.

content: 4 He counts the number of the stars; he gives names to all of them.
content_old: 4 He counts the number of the stars; he gives names to all of them.

content: 5 Great is our Lord, and abundant in power; his understanding is unlimited.
content_old: 5 Great is our Lord, and abundant in power; his understanding is unlimited.

content: 6 Yahweh helps the afflicted up; he brings the wicked down to the ground.
content_old: 6 Yahweh helps the afflicted up; he brings the wicked down to the ground.

content: 7 Sing to Yahweh with thanksgiving; sing praises to our God with lyre,
content_old: 7 Sing to Yahweh with thanksgiving; sing praises to our God with lyre,

content: 8 who covers the heavens with clouds, who provides rain for the earth, who causes grass to grow on the mountains.
content_old: 8 who covers the heavens with clouds, who provides rain for the earth, who causes grass to grow on the mountains.

content: 9 He gives to the animal its food, and to the young ravens that cry.
content_old: 9 He gives to the animal its food, and to the young ravens that cry.

content: 10 He does not delight in the strength of the horse; he takes no pleasure in the legs of the man.
content_old: 10 He does not delight in the strength of the horse; he takes no pleasure in the legs of the man.

content: 11 Yahweh takes pleasure in those who fear him, the ones who hope for his loyal love.
content_old: 11 Yahweh takes pleasure in those who fear him, the ones who hope for his loyal love.

content: 12 Laud Yahweh, O Jerusalem; praise your God, O Zion,
content_old: 12 Laud Yahweh, O Jerusalem; praise your God, O Zion,

content: 13 for he strengthens the bars of your gates. He blesses your children within you;
content_old: 13 for he strengthens the bars of your gates. He blesses your children within you;

content: 14 he makes your border peaceful; he satisfies you with the finest of wheat.
content_old: 14 he makes your border peaceful; he satisfies you with the finest of wheat.

content: 15 He sends out his command to the earth; his word runs swiftly.
content_old: 15 He sends out his command to the earth; his word runs swiftly.

content: 16 He gives snow like wool; he scatters frost like ashes;
content_old: 16 He gives snow like wool; he scatters frost like ashes;

content: 17 he throws his hail like crumbs. Who can stand before his cold?
content_old: 17 he throws his hail like crumbs. Who can stand before his cold?

content: 18 He sends out his word and melts them; he blows his breath, the water flows.
content_old: 18 He sends out his word and melts them; he blows his breath, the water flows.

content: 19 He declares his word to Jacob, his statutes and his ordinances to Israel.
content_old: 19 He declares his word to Jacob, his statutes and his ordinances to Israel.

content: 1 Praise Yah. Praise Yahweh from the heavens; praise him in the heights.
content_old: 1 Praise Yah. Praise Yahweh from the heavens; praise him in the heights.

content: 2 Praise him, all his angels; praise him, all his hosts.
content_old: 2 Praise him, all his angels; praise him, all his hosts.

content: 3 Praise him, sun and moon; praise him, all stars of light.
content_old: 3 Praise him, sun and moon; praise him, all stars of light.

content: 4 Praise him, highest heavens, and waters above the heavens.
content_old: 4 Praise him, highest heavens, and waters above the heavens.

content: 5 Let them praise the name of Yahweh, because he commanded and they were created.
content_old: 5 Let them praise the name of Yahweh, because he commanded and they were created.

content: 6 And he put them in place forever and ever, by a decree he gave that will not pass away.
content_old: 6 And he put them in place forever and ever, by a decree he gave that will not pass away.

content: 7 Praise Yahweh from the earth— great sea creatures and all deeps,
content_old: 7 Praise Yahweh from the earth— great sea creatures and all deeps,

content: 8 fire and hail, snow and cloud, stormy wind doing his bidding,
content_old: 8 fire and hail, snow and cloud, stormy wind doing his bidding,

content: 9 the mountains and all hills, fruit trees and all cedars,
content_old: 9 the mountains and all hills, fruit trees and all cedars,

content: 10 beasts and all cattle, creeping things and flying birds,
content_old: 10 beasts and all cattle, creeping things and flying birds,

content: 11 kings of the earth and all peoples, princes and all judges of the earth,
content_old: 11 kings of the earth and all peoples, princes and all judges of the earth,

content: 12 young men and young women as well, the old together with the young—
content_old: 12 young men and young women as well, the old together with the young—

content: 13 let them praise the name of Yahweh, because his name alone is exalted. His splendor is above earth and heavens.
content_old: 13 let them praise the name of Yahweh, because his name alone is exalted. His splendor is above earth and heavens.

content: 1 Praise Yah. Sing to Yahweh a new song, his praise in the assembly of the faithful.
content_old: 1 Praise Yah. Sing to Yahweh a new song, his praise in the assembly of the faithful.

content: 2 Let Israel be glad in its maker; let the children of Zion rejoice in their king.
content_old: 2 Let Israel be glad in its maker; let the children of Zion rejoice in their king.

content: 3 Let them praise his name with dancing; let them sing praises to him with tambourine and lyre.
content_old: 3 Let them praise his name with dancing; let them sing praises to him with tambourine and lyre.

content: 4 For Yahweh takes pleasure in his people; he glorifies the afflicted with salvation.
content_old: 4 For Yahweh takes pleasure in his people; he glorifies the afflicted with salvation.

content: 5 Let the faithful exult in glory; let them sing for joy on their beds.
content_old: 5 Let the faithful exult in glory; let them sing for joy on their beds.

content: 6 Let the extolling of God be in their throat, and a double-edged sword in their hand,
content_old: 6 Let the extolling of God be in their throat, and a double-edged sword in their hand,

content: 7 to execute vengeance on the nations and punishment on the peoples,
content_old: 7 to execute vengeance on the nations and punishment on the peoples,

content: 8 to bind their kings with chains and their nobles with fetters of iron,
content_old: 8 to bind their kings with chains and their nobles with fetters of iron,

content: 1 Praise Yah. Praise God in his sanctuary; praise him in his mighty firmament.
content_old: 1 Praise Yah. Praise God in his sanctuary; praise him in his mighty firmament.

content: 2 Praise him for his mighty deeds; praise him according to the abundance of his greatness.
content_old: 2 Praise him for his mighty deeds; praise him according to the abundance of his greatness.

content: 3 Praise him with blast of horn; praise him with harp and lyre.
content_old: 3 Praise him with blast of horn; praise him with harp and lyre.

content: 4 Praise him with tambourine and dancing; praise him with strings and flute.
content_old: 4 Praise him with tambourine and dancing; praise him with strings and flute.

content: 5 Praise him with sounding cymbals; praise him with clashing cymbals.
content_old: 5 Praise him with sounding cymbals; praise him with clashing cymbals.
